Perfect Silk Scarf.

All my life my sisters and I have worn those little satin scarves from beauty stores or discount department stores like walmart and target. But with my new hair routine I'm only using the best- the best products, best oils, and the best scarves. I knew that silk was the best I could do, so I searched the net and narrowed down my search to a scarf I found on ebay and on here. This one for its size is the best.

The 30 by 30 in black for 24 dollars plus shipping is a steal. My hair retains so much moisture. I also purchased a silk pillow case (the pillowcase happened to be cheaper on ebay).

What I love most about this scarf is the size- it even fits when I sleep with big rollers (after setting my hair)- it still covers my hair nicely.

Great buy and I feel all women of color should have a silk scarf for their hair, it retains so much more moisture, and this scarf will last substantially longer than those little satin scarves.

Written by recipient ;)

There are other reviews which are somewhat critical of the packaging.  Personally I don't care about that.  The silk was of good quality and the color was even and consistent - not always the case at this price point.  The only real issue was the measurements.  We would have liked a wider longer version and we would have given them 5 stars.  10-12" by 5 ft would be great.  If you are small busted and petite then these will be GREAT for you, but if you have a serious bust then the simple knot will not work the ends will stick out on you.

The silk scarf was certainly as advertised; large, square and blue. The recipient really likes the feel of the silk, but I was just a bit disappointed in the packaging that it came in. I don't expect elaborate slick marketing type packaging, but a simple label, note, care instructions or something would have been nice. A blue square silk scarf in a plastic bag. That's what I got.
I received a polyester scarf at first but the seller quickly corrected this error. I now have the correct scarf and it's exactly what I wanted. It's beautiful, big, and 100% silk!
Nice size, well made and 100% silk. I can hardly wait to wear this to protect my hairstyle when the top is down on my convertible!
I have a short cut, this is perfect for my style.  It's 100% silk and the length and width is perfect to keep my style in place as I sleep.
I love these scarves. I've bought several colors.
just as shown, plain simple opera scarf.

The color is true and rich, and the silk feels wonderful. To me the overall appearance just not quite there. It was originally bought as a gift. I have decided to keep it for me. The winters are very cold and this should add a very comfortable layer around my neck. All ended well.

This was product was misleading. The quality of the scarf is very poor, it's small--I'm not sure what it can be used for. I am very disappointed in this purchase. I can't believe I purchased 3 scarfs at $23+ dollars and I have to return them. Not happy!!!!
Very nice
Nice, but expensive
The hem around the edge looks sloppy and uneven and the color is MUCH lighter than the picture - more of a sky blue than a French blue.
Nice quality. Nice accessory.
Too small
returned it cheap

This is real silk, not polyester.  My wife found a loose thread and burned it, smelled like hair, just as it should.  Nice and heavy, plus it is large enough to cover her entire head.  Haven't washed it yet, but considering it's intended use, should be fine.
Beautiful scarf.
poor quality fabric

I definitely wouldn't call this hunter green.  It's most certainly lighter in color than the picture shown in the product description (see and compare to my photo below).  I'm fairly certain they sent me a "Kelly Green" by mistake.  I will keep it, because it will still work for my purpose plus I just don't have time for an exchange before I need to use it.  It's also smoother and shinier on one side than the other -- something that doesn't matter to me but you might want to be aware of.
Awesome, love it!
Lovely scarf, this will be a gift for my granddaughter who is starting her first teaching job.

The scarf is perfect! It is exactly what I wanted. The material is great quality and I intend to order more in different colors. I find scarfs can be excellent accessories but my favorite use is as head scarfs.
was a gift from me.
It wasn't long enough so it was never used for the purpose.

I just received this in the mail today and was immediately disappointed upon looking it over. It's essentially a small, thin rectangle of cheap cloth with sloppy seams. It MIGHT be worth $4-5, but there is no way I would pay $23 for it had I seen it in person first. "Scarf" is definitely a generous term because it's too small to function as one, unless you're a surprisingly fashionable, premature infant. It's fine as a blindfold, but it won't completely obstruct vision. The only other thing I can imagine using it for given its disappointing material is as a hasty, loosely knotted wrist tie, but I wouldn't expect it to last long and there are much better alternatives in that arena anyway. See Gent House Japanese Clothing Bondage Rope Cotton Rope Role Fun Game Play Kit , for example.

This is a large and luxurious silk scarf, with a thick hand. We purchased it to use it as an altar cloth at our church, and it is perfect. The color is a true gold, as pictured. The seaming is well-done. We are very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it.
Very nice
i love it.  reasonably priced and good quality.
A good looking scarf...
I was a bit disappointed with this item.  Just seemed like a lot of money for such a lightweight product.  It however, came in a speedy manner.

This silk product that costs $23 is a disappointment. It feels very thin and needed to be ironed when I washed it. The other scarf I bought for $6 albeit smaller in size feels thicker and did not need ironing.
The description did not say it was rectangular. I wanted a large square scarve, but the quality is good, therefore I will make use of it.
Very nice quality!
Bought these for my mother, she loves them, perfect!
Nice silk cloth. I would recommend this.
I like this scarf, I use it as a head tie but after using for a while it frays around the edges.
Just what I was looking for!!!
Hate the quality. For the price, you would think the silk would be soft and luxurious. Its so cheap, I never even used it and the store's return policy is janky.
perfect

Great!
I guess I was expecting something a little more substantial than a piece of silk that had been hemmed. Also measure out the length and width before you buy! It's an extremely small piece of fabric...
My organization ordered scarves to be in unison.  They are very nice.  One side has more of a shiny silk gloss finish the other side is duller.  I have enjoyed wearing it.

Small - thought it was bigger. I'll use it for something eventually. The seller was a plus - I wanted to return and didn't realize he wasn't a prime seller - but he was fair and understood and we worked out an arrangement.
Excellent quality, deep rich color. Would buy again from this supplier.
Beautiful (red) silk scarf, of good quality, to replace the substandard one that I wear with my stewardess uniform.
Perfect silk scarf for wrapping my hair at night.
These were purchased for our leadership team.  Excellent quality!  Everyone loves them!
So I paid $25 for a half of scarf what the hell I'm doinv with half of scarf that can't even cover my head.

I was disappointed in the actual size. It was shaped different and smaller than I expected.
Delivery was on time, but the scarf was much shorter than what I thought it would be.
very thin
little pricey but  overall it's a good value & quality.  Would definitely buy again.
not long and wide enough

Great price for such a high quality silk. I purchased this as a little extra to go with my wife's Valentine's day present, and it was a win/win. She loved it on sight, and ever since has worn it as a belt with different outfits. Every time she wears it, it is a reminder of the love I tried to show her on Valentine's day. That's never a bad thing! I intend to buy her more in different colors in the near future.
beautiful scarf well made great navy color
The color has nothing to do with dark grey. It is dirty medium brown. Doesn't match the rest of my wardrobe. Went to the Goodwill.

I loves the scarf. It lasts me a really long time up until the time that my mom put it inside of the washing machine :/ but it was well worth the price. I slept in it every night and for months it was really uncomfortable. Only problem was after a few months the scarf started coming off my head. Just wouldn't stay on tight enough at night. Not sure why, but overall I loved this scarf.
This scarf does not feel like silk - it feels like a synthetic and even washes like one. It is a heavy denier.

I bought these as a gift, and they are more like handkerchiefs than scarves. Be careful to read everything. They are the size posted but are so thin and light as to be essentially weightless.

Just be aware that these are not great for actual "scarves".. look for a silk blend instead! I will be returning mine.
This was a gift for my boyfriend who is 6 Feet 2 and weighs 220 lbs. He also body builds so the scarf was even shorter. This was not the scarf for him.
I love the scarf. I bought it as a nightly scarf alternative to polyester. It is true silk as well. The reason why I gave it 4 stars was because it is so big, but other than that it is worth it.

I'm in my late teens with C3 hair and I like these Silk Scarfs a lot. I first got it because I heard that Silk and Satin are the best fabrics to wear on your hair unlike cotton (which breaks and dries your hair out). I first got the purple one and loved it so much, I got the white one and the black one for my mom. I have had the purple one for awhile now and I still have nothing bad to say about it, but the only problem I do have with the white one is that it somehow got a stain in it. I do love the fact that these are 100% Silk, and it says that right on the tags. It also says to 'dry clean only' but I have thrown them in the washer machine a few times and they still work great, but don't put them in the drier. All that said, If I had more money I would buy a couple more in different colors.
This is a great silk scarf.  Very soft and has a great shine. This is definitely good quality silk. The color is also very rich.
Loved it.
I ordered the 30" x 30" square scarf and i got a necktie instead !!! i don't know what am i supposed to do with a silk necktie now.
I liked the scarf, but the size was a little small and the silk was a little thin. The color was perfect.

I have been purchasing from Amazon for along time.  I rarely leave customer reviews because I'm always satisfied.  However, after receiving this product today, I had to take the time to warn future customers.  As in previous reviews about this 100% silk scarf, I as well learned that is not 100%.  It has a cheap little label on the bottom that says 100%.  It is 100% polyester.  This is one of the most coarse scarfs I have ever felt.  I am totally disappointed with this purchase.  I will be returning it and I would strongly advise for you to shop around before you purchase this scarf and pay for shipping.  It comes in very cheap packaging and the priority mail envelope says received damaged.

I purchased the brown scarf almost a month ago. I probably read all the reviews before purchasing this scarf. Cant remember all of them now but an old reviewer said the stitching was off so I wasn't sure about the quality. I learned that the quality of silk  is based on weight & measured in mm. There wasn't any reference to this & someone said they can see through the scarf.  I made my final decision to buy this scarf based on the review about the person who did research said this is a good price & she recommended the larger 30 x 30, if your intend is for hair care. This along with a travel pillow case are my first silk purchase.( I bought them same day or a day apart) The scarf is very soft, smooth, & intact stitching all the way around. This has a nice light weight but very soft sturdy quality product. It is not see through as someone claimed. I compared my new silk pillowcase too my new silk scarf & the pillowcase is soft & of good quality. However, in comparison this scarf is of great quality & superior in softness. Its super smooth but not slippery. I wear this scarf on my head EVERY night for my Afro - textured hair. I measured the scarf & its exactly as described. It shipped fast in a fed ex envelope, packaged in clear wrapping, included  description of product, return information, not sure what else. The scarf does have a label that reads dry clean only on the inside, I that part off. I believe someone was upset about the packaging being clear plastic? It was wrapped in the same clear material that you would get if you bought a button down collar shirt @ a department store but without all the extra cardboard & unnecessary clips. The only problem now is I love my scarf so much I want silk linen. lol . Almost  forgot I was excited to get my scarf so I did take several pics with my phone. However, I don't know how to get this phone to upload to my computer, so when I figure it out I will post pics of my brown scarf. FYI.  A silk scarf  can maintains hairstyle, holds moisture in your hair & prevents hair loss from friction. Cotton pulls moisture out of hair & snags hair right off of your head while you sleep. All hair types can experience dryness so the benefits of a silk scarf not just limited to black people or women.

This works excellent as a hair scarf. It could have been a bit bigger, but overall accomplishes my goal of helping eliminate hair shedding from certain fabrics of sheets causing extra shedding of my hair.
When I opened the scarf it was pretty in pink. The stitching was even, and the fabric was soft. Its big enough to wrap around my neck and cover my hair at night. I love this scarf.

Possibly the best watch I've ever owned - and I'm 54.  Light in weight, slim in profile, elegant, classy design, and Seiko quality. The second hand aligns perfectly on my watch with the slash marks. The accuracy of time keeping is slightly less impressive - mine gains 7 seconds a month, or about 1 1/2 seconds a week. Not the most accurate Seiko I've ever owned, in fact my Pulsar keeps slightly better time, as it gains only around 4 seconds/month.
And yet, this model exemplifies the spirit and ethos of SEIKO (which means "exquisite" ).
It's my favourite watch, ever.

I bought this to replace an old digital watch. I have a few needs when it comes to a watch, and those are easy readability, day/date, a sapphire crystal, and a screwed-down caseback. This Seiko has all of that, and the very lightweight titanium case is a fun plus. For around $150-200, you get all of the hallmarks of a fancy watch, and the shiny white dial with bright lume+polished markers makes for a piece that can be worn with dressier attire or casual wear. Seiko has a history of fantastic watches and this one continues it.
Great watch.  Looks good.  Keeps good time.  Lightweight.  no scratches.

I got my boyfriend this watch for Valentine's day and we are completely satisfied! He loved it and it's very light. Great product and was packaged very well. There was no way it could get damaged through processing.
The color is the one I ordered and arrived on time. But the cloth is really thin and the sewing on the edges are uneven and some times loosed.

I am a woman of color and purchased this silk scarf as a hair wrap.  I love it. I finally found a 100% silk scarf to use as part of my healthy hair care regimen.  I read the previous reviews and was afraid to purchase because there seemed to be mixed feelings about it, but I am glad that I did.  It's great quality material and serves the purpose for which I purchased it for.  Yes it came in a little plastic envelope, but I don't care too much about the packaging.  Great quality, good size, and a pretty good price.  I think I made a good choice.  I will say that the color wasn't what I thought it would be.  I ordered the 30"x30" in fuschia but it looked more like a bright pink.  I still like it.  If you're looking for a good silk scarf for your hair I would definitely purchase it.  I'm even considering purchasing  the longer one to use as maybe a winter scarf for further hair protection during the winter.  Rather have silk rubbing against my nape than a cotton scarf.  I hope this helped someone!
Way too small for a scarf, cannot be used neither as a scarf nor as an ascot.  The material is okay.
It's very pretty, but it puckers slightly on the edges where it's stitched.  However, I feel that it's a good value.
The color is a perfect green for me, not too light and not too dark. It feels soooooooo luxurious around my neck.

This is not a large scarf but PERFECT for what I wanted.  My wife loves it ... nice color, nice material.  Perfect.

WV Crockett
I needed a black silk scarf quickly and this one was okay.  I did not look around very long. If I had I might have looked for and maybe found one that was longer, but that was my ignorance.

I purchased this scarf as a gift. I decided to shop Amazon because I needed a white silk scarf and couldn't find any in the department stores. The recipient seemed very pleased and wrapped it around her neck as soon as she opened it purring, oooh I like it.
These came in beautiful condition. I purchased several in different colors. I have put them aside for use as I need them for accent.

So seeing as how I am african american and I wrap my hair every night I'm always on the hunt for a good scarf. This size and consistency is great. Obviously the only downside is that it has the tendency to slip off your hair at a more rapid rate than a cloth one but you can't beat the benefits it provides. I wish it was a little cheaper but I haven't found a better deal for the quality so I'm probably going to be pruchasing another one. I purchased the 30 X 30 in black.

I have been looking for a sling bag for quite some time now. The only ones I found in stores were small and being the girlie girl that I am, I also was looking at colors other than black or navy blue. This ASICS sling bag (which I purchased in pink, of course) is AMAZING: more pockets than you can count, this bag is HUGE! I could easily fit 2 beach towels in there! The fabric seems durable and easy to clean. The only drawback may be the lack of clips to close the bag. It's a good old velcro and elastic bands.
I would recommend this bag to anyone.

Have used the bag for 6months for college with zero problems.
The material is a light, 600D Polyester, and the stitching is nothing special but so far durable.
The strap might be too short if your obese or large, but perfect if your average size.
Size wise it can just about fit 3-4 thick textbooks, but any more than 2 makes it uncomfortable.
The zippers aren't oversized, but should be!

Great product. Super roomy, very comfy, lots of individual pockets too.
The royal blue is fabulous colour. Well constructed and well designed

For inexpensive, rubbery flip flops, these are really durable and comfortable. I have an old pair of rubber ones from an upscale retailer, and they became misshapen and flat pretty quickly. Not these. I have two pair and am considering a third .....

The shoes themselves were stamped 39 cm. however, they were actually either 40 or 41 cm. At least they weren't too small. I decided not to exchange because they took so long to arrive in the first place...I'd still be waiting I think...

I love havaiana flip flops and prefer to wear only these! They are comfortable, very durable, and last a really long time. The only issue I had with mine was the fact that since they were shipped, the top straps that sit over my foot warped a little bit and it took them a long long time to straighten out and sit right.
This product was shipped quickly and was exactly what i was looking for...the shoes are great if you don't already own a pair you should try them out!

I really like these flip flops, but whether they are worth the money is questionable. They are very soft and comfortable, but don't seem that much different from other flip flops you can get a the drugstore.
my fav sandals in black cant match them with anything  i love that they r comfy and how they won't slip wheres it wet!
The best flip-flop to be found.  This transaction was seamless and the shipping efficient.

These are the most comfortable flip-flops I've ever had.  They are so soft, yet sturdy.  I have many pairs in lots of colors and wear them every chance I get.  I think they're different because they're made of rubber instead of foam.  More expensive than the cheap ones at Target that cost $2, but worth the $15 or so for these.  They are so comfortable!  You will love them.

I ordered 2 pairs of these flip-flops since I misplaced the pair of flip-flops I had here several days ago while moving some stuff around and have not been able to find them. No doubt they will eventually re-appear, but I missed not having a pair since I use them every morning to get in and out of the bath, and even to wear around my residence.  There was a slight glitch during the delivery process since this item was shipped by DHL Home to my P. O. Box, and DHL does not generally deliver to P. O. boxes.  The moment I realized that the shipment had been sent out by DHL, I contacted Amazon customer service and spoke to a nice woman by the name of Tasha (Amazon has a service where their customer service people will call YOU immediately, and this is exactly what Tasha did), who was very helpful and ensured that this delivery would get to me in the event that DHL was not able to leave my package with the Post Office.  I am not sure what transpired, exactly, but the package arrived at the Post Office yesterday, 2 days before it's scheduled delivery date and I was able to pick it up last night.  I have to say that all of my experiences with Amazon have been very positive, and I have recommended them to many people. The flip-flops themselves are comfortable, although I was surprised by the rough, raised pattern on the surface of the foot pad.  Intially, I wasn't sure that I would like walking on it, but now it feels like getting a little foot massage. I bet the surface texture was added so that the your feet don't slide when the flip-flops get wet.  If so, this is welcome. Since it is now the winter season, the store where I purchased the pair I misplaced currently has none in stock. This is another nice feature of shopping Amazon.com. You can find things "out of season".

I have over ten pairs of Havaianas and I love them all! They stay put on my feet and are never slippery in and out of water. This is a nice shade of navy, which goes with everything. My work is pretty casual, so I'm usually in this or one of my pairs of Havaianas all day.
I recieved my flip flops right in time for my vacation and they were Perfect! I love the color and as with all my other Havaianas very comfy !
These look like knock offs. Much wider and look nothing like what I have previously purchased in stores. I should have known better based on the price.
The rubber molding leaves a ridge on the underside of the strap. The ridge was rubbing my feet raw, but I sanded it down with a nail file and now these sandals are truly comfortable!
Way too wide.  If your feet are square then these are for you.
I will buy it again ..
Love it!

Seriously one of the most comfortable flip flops I have owned. They have enough give for comfort. The straps are not to tight and doesn't cling to your foot, even wet. It also feels like to has grip and doesn't feel slippery (they are not nod-skid) when you walk on wet surfaces as some of your shoes do.

On a sad note, my puppy loved them too and chewed them up (user error, shouldn't have left them around within puppy's reach... rookie mistake) so I'm buying another pair.
My favorite flip flops of all time. Nice thick sole but still soft and comfortable.

Love me some flip-flops and these are a great basic white and very comfortable.
I ordered these basically for the shower at the hospital when I had my son. They are perfect for that but I would not want to wear them for a long time or to walk long distances.

Received these promptly.  Nice,  rubber,  slimmer cut flip flop.  Seems like it would be less 'slidey' however,  if you were an exact size 10, (like I do)  order up to the 11. I'm happy with my purchase,  but sz.  9-10 is cut to exactly 10 inches.  A bit 'short' with no room extending from the front 'toe' part.  I will re-order though because they seem like a very stable,  well made flip flop for a slim to average width foot.
Great, as expected. This brand makes great quality stuff!

These fit as a 7-8 (I'm usually a 71/2, so they're a perfect fit for me) and are durable.  I've had other pairs that have fallen apart within a summer but I've had these for sometime now and since I'm constantly in sunny areas, they get a LOT of use.  Good purchase.

The product fit as expected and the material was the same, flexible stuff we know and love. Unfortunately, the part from the thong, on the sole is sitting on top of the sole, rather than fitting in which is uncomfortable and a tripping hazard. I ordered a replacement pair and both were the same.

These flip flops are so comfortable, although this pair is a little on the small side.  My last pair are marked 39-40 (USA 7/8) and fit perfectly.  I had trouble deciding what size to order based on Havaianas size chart that said 39-40 (USA 9/10), 37-38 (USA 7/8).  I figured the 9-10 would be too big and went with the 7/8 since that was what I had before.  They are a lot smaller than my previous pair of 7/8 (my heel slightly hangs off the back unless I shove my foot all the way in).  Since I only wear them around the house I kept them instead of dealing with returns.
comfortable and easy to pack
they arrived quite twisted up. Hopefully they straighten out with time.
I love them
true to size

Very happy with mine! I was a bit skeptical about which size to order as there are quite a few different sizes to choose from on the list. I am a USA size 6 and ordered the 35 BR/6 W US. They fit perfectly! The sizing on the actual flip flops reads: USA 6W/5M EUR 37/38 and underneath the havaianas symbol it reads 35-36. Hope this helps if you are confused about which size is best for you. And I do have a bit of a wide foot from ball to little toe.

i have wide feet and these are far too thin.  also, as you can see, the traps go into the top of the sandal...  this really sucks, hurts to walk on

Cheaply made, The V of the thong is razor sharp and made a slice between my toes! Who knew you could be injured by a pair of plastic flip flops. Fit and color as expected I wear US size 7. Love Havianas they are the most stylish and durable flip flops ! I will be ordering more colors and styles.

These are my fav flip flops.  Love to wear them around the house and if I happen to run out with them on I don't feel like I'm walking barefooted.  The straps were a little loose on this particular pair but otherwise the quality is good and the straps don't feel flimsy.  I try to buy them on sale so it's a good deal when I find them.

These are the only flip flops I will wear.  They are constructed of a much more dense material than some of the other "chain" stores sell .Chain store flip flops can't come close to these.  But, you get what you pay for!  I have 3 pairs in 3 different colors. They are my "go to" no matter what season ( I live in AZ, so I really get wear out of them all year long!)and they last!

So far, so good. This is my forth pair of Havaianas flip flops. My first and second pair lasted more than a year with near constant daily use in the summer including going to the beach, the zoo, etc. My third pair were ladies slim cut, they were awful. Despite being longer than needed, my toes always ended up hanging over the edge and I tripped/stubbed them often. They also were more flimsy and would bend in half when walking if I wasn't careful. These were everything I was looking for. I have been wearing them around all summer without any issues. Definitely glad to have them!

These are my second pair of Marine Blue Women's Havaianas in size 37/38. I'm a 7.5 US or 37.5 in European sizing and these fit me perfectly. I have ever so slightly narrow feet and this are not too wide for me. If you have wide feet, I don't think these will work for you. I don't find that I need break-in time for my Havaianas, but I'm used to wearing thong-style sandals. My previous pair lasted 3 summers and were going strong until they got covered in crude oil from a beach overseas (gross! and no way to save them). There really is a huge difference between Havaianas rubber flip flops and the super cheap ones you get at an Old Navy or the like. The soles of these don't smoosh down and flatten out like cheaper imitations. The thong between the toes didn't loosen or come detached and I lived in my previous pair. New pair has already handled a 4 day Florida trip and look like new. Marine Blue color is a true, royal blue and I find them to be a fun pop of color even when I'm not wearing blue. Because it's a deeper shade (as pictured), they don't show dirt or smudges.

The ones I received are clearly knock-offs as the sizing is inaccurate. They are a EUR41/2 ; BR39-40 and US Women's 7/8. This is wrong. The corresponding size in the US system would be a US Men's 7/8 (equivalent to a US Women's 9/10). I purchased several pairs of Havaianas while living in Brazil (always the 39-40) and they were not like these. I have to say they are pretty good quality knock-offs though - which explains why I paid only 9.99.

I bought these to replace some of the same brand that I used in the shower.
The original pair hurt my feet when walking, they rubbed in between my toes & cut the skin.
So I used them in the shower where I don't walk :)

Those originals finally got black with mildew  & after trying several things to clean them I tossed them & replaced them with these.
I haven't tried walking with them but the post between the toes do feel strong.
So many people buy, walk with & love this make of shoes so maybe it's my feet that are less robust than others that make them sore. I have found that other similar flip flops & sandals my feel between my toes get a bit sore at 1st but then my feet get used to them & toughen up but that didn't happen with these for me. You may have better luck.
But for the shower they are fine. I think I just need to scrub them more often with soapy water to keep the mold at bay in this humid weather.

later: I just compared these new flip flops with the pair I'm throwing out & the post between the toes is thinner so things have changed & maybe I'd do better walking in these now.

I love these Havaianas! I wear them every day! The rubber sole is cushy and the straps never rub. It's true, they don't offer any arch support - not sure that many casual sandals do - but I also have a very flat foot so it is fine for me. My feet are also wide (maybe due to no arch?), and these sandals fit perfectly. I have worn their "slim" fit style as well, which I like, but realistically I should be in these classic Havaianas. My last pair did break at the toe-hook thing,, but I had worn them for several years! I wear anywhere between a 9 and a 10 in US Women's, and the sizing chart said that would be a 39/40; this was accurate as they fit perfectly. Additionally, the pair I received were free of defects and indeed Havaianas brand. I am not sure why others have had issues when ordering theirs, but using Prime with free shipping and returns can definitely help in the event the item you receive isn't as you expected.

So this is the third pair of Havaianas flip flops that I've purchased. The first pair was too small even though I ordered a size that said br 39/40 us 9/10. When I received the shoe it was too small and the shoe was clearly stamped size 7/8. So I enlisted the help of customer service to order the correct size. I was reassured the first pair was just a mistake and since I needed a size 9 he again ordered me the br 39/40 us 9/10. Guess what? Wrong again!  shoes came stamped with size 7/8! Ok so thought I'd give it one more try and this time ordered size br 41/ US 11/12 in a different color..they arrive and fit perfectly. this time the shoes are stamped with a size 9. HOWEVER the strap on the right foot is twisted in such a way that it wouldn't lay flat against my foot and was very uncomfortable plus unbelievably it's a different color than the rest of the shoe it's like it had been faded out or something! Needless to say back they go and no more Havaianas for me!!!!

These flip flops are great. They fit perfectly and the sole is made from relatively dense rubber, which means they will last. I usually buy the flip flops that cost $1.25 and they barely last a single summer. I decided to shop the big leagues and buy these. They are worth the extra cost because I suspect they will last several summer seasons.

The foam is dense, fully color-impregnated and supportive to the point of us doubting they'll ever look anything less than brand-new, even now, well-past Labor Day 2013.
The straps seem a tad on the narrow side, but nothing to cause a blister, even on the longest of summer vacations.  That said, I've always been eager to have my driving foot bare when wearing them. Nothing untoward has happened, but the fit makes it so that driving barefooted is less anxiety-provoking than with the Havaiana on my right foot.  There's just something about the feel when in driving position - and, to be fair, these aren't driving mocs! LOL -
While the other flip-flops are still an option, we see them more as costume adornments to be worn a few times and repurposed, or donated, while the Havaianas are real keepers.
So, if the straps feel a bit snug at first, as in our cases, they stay that way all summer but never cause even one blister, so, no need to return them (for us).
And, if the 10x more than Old Navy, etc gives you pause:Think of them as tires for your feet and know you'll be receiving many mores miles in exchange for the price - (but, $3 Old Navy's are A-OK too, we just got ourselves some of those this week - but expect only 1 to 10 wears from them, tops - Havaianas, on the other hand have seen us through many months of 2013 and still look like they're brand-new!
We've been fond of Havaianas since the 1970s!
No complaints -ever!

I bought a pair of blue havaianas from a department store 3 years ago. I never liked sandals much, but that pair was amazingly comfortable. Last summer, I got tired of bringing them back and forth between home and college and decided it was time to buy a new pair anyway.

I decided to go with a brown pair, but much to my disappointment, they were some of the most uncomfortable sandals I have ever worn. I pretty much avoid wearing them at all costs. Even though my blue sandals' thong keeps coming out, I'd still much rather wear those than these brown ones. Straight out of the packaging, the thongs were crushed and twisted in such a way that you can't just stuff your feet in them. You have to manipulate them around with your hands before your feet will fit. No amount of shaping has corrected this issue. The platform is also incredibly hard. It does not feel like how my old blue ones felt like at all, even straight out of the packaging. I understand this might be a breaking in issue, but I don't recall my blue ones being this uncomfortable.

Needless to say, I've worn these sandals maybe thrice since purchasing them.

I wear a size 6 shoe so I purchased a 5/6 flip flop. The sole of the flip flop is the right size, but it is so thin, you might as well go barefoot; whatever you are walking on, you can feel through to the soles of your feet. I also do not like the straps - maybe a mistake was made during manufacturing.  It looks/feels like size 10 straps on 5/6 flip flops; the flip flops will not stay on my feet. I will use them when I have to run outside for a few moments - but otherwise they are worthless if wearing more than a few minutes.

I LOVE these flip flops.  These are my third pair, and while they are a little bit more expensive, they are worth it.  The material almost grips your feet while you walk, and get more comfortable as they wear.  They also last far longer than the cheaper ones. I love havaianas! I have two pairs, one brown and one blue, I couldn't wait to get some black one's! They're so comfortable and very simple and cute.
Love my Havaianas, a wardrobe staple for the summer.  Very comfy for flip flops

These are definitely my favorite flip flops. I got a pair in Navy Blue a few years ago and absolutely loved them. Somewhere along the way I lost track of them and I've missed them ever since. Living in the heat of the South, I've gone through several pairs of flip flops over the years but never quite fell in love with any as much as these. Or if I did love a pair I would wear them so much they would break down and fall apart... some even developed funky odors rendering them unwearable.

Admittedly it may seem a bit odd to be professing love for a pair of flip flops. In particularl these as they are fairly standard looking as far as flip flops go. But there's just something about the shape of this particular brand and model (the Top, not the Slim) that seems to flatter my foot more than any other flip flop. I can't explain it. Is it because I have wider than average feet? Anywho, aside from vanity they're just super comfy and their weight is ideal - not too heavy and bulky, but still of substance. They're also very convenient - good at the beach/pool/shower and they also have enough cushioning (for me at least) to do plenty of walking if I need to. Of course, as with any flip flop, I would not go hiking or do any activities that would require actual traction. They aren't as sturdy as, say, Rainbows, but honestly I far prefer the feel of rubber under my feet. I tend to find leather very drying. Still, though, they are sturdy enough and they seem to hold up to wear and tear with ease so I trust they will last quite a while, assuming one doesn't lose them.

Thus, for the aforementioned reasons, I finally got myself another pair, again in Navy Blue a few months ago when they were on sale and I have not been disappointed. A note on sizing - I generally wear a women's size 8, on the nose. Apparently, after looking through my order history, when I ordered these the first time I got a size 39/40 (US 8/9). This time, for some unknown reason I ended up ordering a size 37/38 (US 7/8) and the fit feels perfectly fine to me. Maybe my feet have shrunk? Honestly I don't remember ever being dissatisfied with larger size, so my thinking is that the sizing might be rather flexible. If you prefer tighter fitting flops order down, if you prefer having plenty of flop behind your heel order up. But who knows, maybe I have weird feet.

Oh, and for reference - in the picture of the flip flops next to a black slide on - the black slide on is size 8 & 1/2. I threw in the blue notebook for color reference. I suppose size 37/38 does just barely fit my foot, but that's the way I prefer it as I usually end up tripping over flip flops that are much longer. As long as my foot's not falling off the edge of the shoe I'm happy.
Best flip flops you could ever buy

I bought these Havaianas on amazon because I heard that this brand was great for flip flops, so I wanted to try it out. I get anxious when ordering items that have sizes online since I don't want to accidentally order the wrong size. So I went to various sites including the original Havaianas store online and checked that I was ordering the right size. However, when I got my package in the mail and I put the flip flops on, the back of my heel protruded at least a good inch or so. I was quite sad when this occurred after all my hard work of trying to find the right size. Thankfully, my roommate was interested in buying them so I didn't have to return the shoes.

I think I might order a pair my size in the future though. I still want to test how comfortable these shoes are!

After buying a cheapo flip flop in the past, I can say that it's definitely worth forking out the big bucks for a good quality Havaianas. My cheapos, lasted a week, the foam started to shrink and the color discoloured onto my feet. My Havaianas on the other hand have maintained their thickness. They don't stain my feet (I've got black ones) and I've worn them to everywhere (even riding my bike). Best part is, they are so comfy.
sizes seems off.. I asked for M60 & the flip flop said M50 but it was still little bit lose... the quality is much better... & soft...

These are THE BEST flip flops ever. Seriously, I mean it!  I live Austin, TX and the flip flop is the unofficial state shoe almost year round, however, the heat and humidity here can really take a toll on the poor standard flip flop and they burn out (at least mine did) within a month of being put into use. But not Havaianas! These last for the long haul and their pretty designs do not rub off or fade after repeated wearing.  They last so long that it is hard to justify buying more than one pair, but I haven't let that stop me!  If you are looking for a durable, pretty little flip flop for the summer - you can do no better than these. The price may be a bit more than your standard drug store $1.99 variety but Havaianas are well and truly worth it.
I tired these flip flops thinking they would be comfortable but I ended up giving them away.  Nothing special.

I thought I would try some Havianas because  I have been seeing them all over the internet. When I was a kid we always used to have what we called "zoris" for most of the summer and part of the rest of the year. Growing up in California, these were the obligatory shoes for kids. And cheap. Havianas aren't cheap, but I thought I would try a pair to see if they were sturdier than discount store thong flip flops. The one problem with thong flip flops is they wear out. And a lot of the ones you can purchase at discount stores are made of very cheap materials, not rubber, like they used to do back in the day. These appear to be made of rubber, and it seems like they will last longer than the discount ones. That being said, they probably won't last all that much longer, and they also have very high straps for some weird reason. You can tell this from the photo. I don't have skinny feet; my feet are somewhat akin to a ducks and are thick, but these were very loose and when wearing a thong sandal, you don't want loose straps. I purchased another pair in another color and they were the same so I am assuming this is true for all Havianas. Big box retailers, some of who sell here on Amazon I was happy to find, are now making thongs in more rubber-like materials and I bought some really sturdy retro ones the other day for $2.50. So this was the last pair of Havianas I will be purchasing, regardless of the cute patterns and colors they have. Save your money and just buy another pair of the color you like best at the big box store or here on Amazon so when the first ones wear out, you still have the same color. I could buy 4 pairs and have the same thong for a lot longer than these Havianas will last me, that's for sure.
I'd been having trouble finding good quality flip flops that were sturdy yet supple.  These are just the ticket.  And a pretty color to boot.

BE VERY AWARE OF SIZING!  I am a Havaianas lover.  I have several pairs of them but this was my first time ordering them off amazon.  The most recent pair I bought are the slim ones and the size stamp on the sole says 37/38BR and usa 7/8W.  These are the ones I looked at to determine the sizing when I ordered these.  I ordered 37/38BR US 7/8 but when they just came, the size stamp on the sole says BR37/38 BUT USA 6 and I tried them on and they seemed smaller than my other Top Flip Flops with the wider band.  So then I looked at my other Havaianas with the wide band and they all have a size stamp of 39/40 and USA 7/8.  So what I determined is that the slim fit ones are specifically sized for women and the wide bands ones are actually mens sizes.  Anyways, if it helps, I wear a 37/38 USA 7/8 W in the slim band Havaianas and a 39/40 USA 7/8 in the wide band ones and I am between an 8 and a 9 in normal shoes depending on the brand.  So the ones I ordered are a little smaller than I would like but they are still wearable.  BTW, Havaianas are my all time favorite flip flop - soon comfortable!

I typically wear size 7 1/2 dress shoe and size 8 - 8 1/2 running shoe or boots and I wear size 39 in Havaianas (my foot is close to the edges as I tend to trip if there is extra space at the toe). If you tend to have a wider foot you will want to order wide.
