They were comfortable though for the 3 seconds I tried them on :)

This is my second pair of this exact style. The first one lasted 7 years so I hope these will be the same. I was a little disappointed that I ordered the exact same size but these were a size bigger. The others will a tad small so these are probably 1/2 size too big. I don't know if the company changed their sizing, but be aware when ordering.

I am a BIG FAN of Havaianas as a Pima (o'odham) chick... we are from the Southern Arizona desert so traditional we have sported sandals for a millennia. Anyway..being the fan I am of Havaianas... these are... Weird. The Sole of it feels a little gummy.. a little sticky. NONE of my Nordstrom purchased Havaianas have ever felt like this..and I have owned/currently own MANY. They feel sticky.. and that makes them uncomfortable for me to wear. Usually its flip flops with Designs that feel this way. Well these don't have any AND the Havaianas with designs NEVER feel sticky or anything. If anything--the coating they put makes them feel EVEN NICER TO WEAR!!(or I am guessing, I have no idea if they put a coating on the design of their flip flops...)  anyway--I keep trying to wear them.. even around the house. I have washed them im my washer a few times, and as a matter of fact they are in my washer AGAIN in hopes of them being a bit more nicer feeling on the feet. The flip flops came dusty. Kinda nasty, but they do not look like knock offs in comparasion to the other Havaianas I have here at home. I just don't know :( I might stick to Nordstroms for my Havaianas or to the Official Havaianas site to buy any other pairs of flip flops.....not sure I will buy again from Amazon. My feet MUST be comfortable in my flip flops... it drives me nuts to have my feel sticking with every step--Whether my feet are extra clean or its at the end of the day---the result is the same..STICK, STICK, STICK :(
Love
great~~
The best flip flops

I own two pairs of Havaianas, so that is what I based my size off of. These fit exactly as expected, based on my other Havaianas. My advice is to go to a store that sells Havaianas and figure out what size you are before purchasing online.
love these sandals. very sturdy and strong material
Best flip flops in the WORLD. I have a pair that I bought 4 years ago and they are still comfy and amazing!
one strap was squished in the package so you can't just slip it on.
Good traction and become even more comfortable with time.  They are my one and only flip flips and ted to need replacing every two to three years, after a LOT of wear!
Love them!
Favorite flops!
They are my first Havaianas and I love them! They are very comfortable, simple but nice. Easy to fit different outfits
Love!

I purchased this sometime last year and thought I'd be a 37/38 based on the size chart but they were too small. The 39/40 fits well and is great for under $15. They're much more comfortable than Old Navy flip flops and the soles are thicker.

It's amazing what getting your wife the right flip flops will do.  These things make her so happy...go figure?!

What super nice is that these things are easily $25-$35 at "brick and mortar" store.  Even other online vendors are higher priced.  shipped on time, authentic and they fit her well.

if you want havaianas, this is the place to get them.
These are about a half size to small. I own about 10 pair, all the same size and style, and these don't seem to be quite the same as the rest.

These are fabulously simple sandals. The soles are textured so they're not slippery like some other brands. What I really like about these is that they're washable. Just pitch them in the washer and !voila! They look brand new. I have a couple of pairs that are several years old but you'd never know it, the material is very durable.
These fit well, however they gave me blisters the first time I wore them to the beach. The strap is thick and rubbed my skin raw. Hopefully once I've broken them in they will be more comfortable.
Havaianas are my favorite flip flop.  I have bad knees and these are the only ones that give me enough support while being reasonably priced.  I have almost every color!

I fell in love with Havaianas almost a decade ago when a coworker brought a pair back from Brazil.  I still have that pair - they've held up that long.  I've only ever had one pair break, and I assure you that was after heavy-duty usage.  These flip flops hold up and are SUPER comfortable!
these are the perfect every day super casual go anywhere black sandal.  never rub, wouldnt be devastated if i lost one as they are a reasonable price and sturdy

Gorgeous color, fit perfect, so comfortable! I ordered these because the last pair of Havianas I had finally broke after 8 years of owning them and wearing them constantly. A great shoe and a staple as far as I'm concerned!
Good but should be cheaper, There is cheaper ones in the market with the same quality. But are good h.
These flip flops are wonderful and the color is as expected.  These flip flops are very durable and lost a very long time.
I have multiple pairs of these. They ever let me down. Theres no "breaking in" period. Always comfy. Resilient, and cute!
They're comfortable and easy to wear.  No pinching or blistering and hold up well.  I would definitely recommend these sandals!
I usually buy down 1 size in flip flops because I don't have to worry about the width.  These were no different.  I would recommend buying your same size only if you need it for the length.

I ordered an 11/12 because I typically wear 9 1/2-10 and I like my flipflops to be a little too big. They fit more comfortably and I can get them on easily. What I received was a pair of size 9's. I've been trying to decide whether or not to return them, as they mostly fit, with a tiny bit of overhang with my toe. I feel like, for the expense involved in buying these, I should've at least have gotten the right size.

I put them as okay because, given the size I have to wear, they are "okay." They're pretty comfortable, even if they're not easy to slip on and off, and I like that the heel is higher in the back. Because they're flip-flops, and because we live in another country, I likely won't bother returning them. Still, not sure I'll ever bother buying another pair, either. Nice as they are, if they're not the size you want, what's the point? It really creates a rift of trust between the seller and I, honestly. That said, if you get them in the right size, I imagine they're great.
Like the flip flop.  I'm glad I followed the advice of the other reviews and ordered a size up.  I normally wear size 7 1/2 -8, but ordered the 9/10 and it fits perfect, just right.

Obviously one is not hiking in flip flops, but for general comfy, running-around flip flops, these beat the pants off the Old Gappy and Archery store generics. Wear great. I'll buy Havianas going forward.

I have somewhat wide feet and my baby toe tries to sneak off my sandals. These are wide enough to keep all 5 toes on board, without looking like I'm walking on tennis rackets! They're squishy and comfortable and stay on my feet perfectly while chasing my 6 yr old twins!
i have been using havaianas for as long as i can remember! thy fit me perfectly and were a great price!!

The size chart is wrong, Brazil 37/38 is not a US 7/8.
I should have bought a 39/40, the shoe says US, my feet say "eh sort of small."
I bought them to use in gym showers, so I am making do and using them.
They have a weird texture at first but once you break them in they're super comfortable! I bought two pairs one to use at the gym as shower slippers and the other to walk around my home in
These are amazing...  I have them in so many colors and they last forever and the soles very comfortable for walking, I love them!
This was not what I expected, I use Havaianas for years and  the quality of these one  wasn't good for what I know as  Havaianas. I returned the flip flop
I love Havianas and these are no exception. They don't cause rashes/chaffing on my feet and are comfortable to wear for long periods of time.

Definitely disappointed after hearing all the praise for the Havaianas flip-flops. I live in a mild climate and wear flip-flops almost exclusively throughout spring, summer and part of fall and have owned several pairs, so I was expecting to love the Havaianas.  Unfortunately, they are not comfortable for me at all.  I feel like I'm walking on a very hard surface instead of cushioned surface and the part that goes in between my toes is causing discomfort.  I wore these  shoes all day yesterday for the first time and couldn't wait to get home and put on my $2.50 cheap pair that I bought at JCPenney on clearance last year.  I will not be buying these in the future.

I was under the impression that these were to fit women's feet, however, when I tried mine on it was quite obvious that the flip-flop was intended for wider (male) feet. If you're drawn in by the price, make sure you order a few sizes smaller than you would generally wear.
I'm usually a 7 1/2 or 8 size shoe so I thought that this size 7-8 would be perfect.  It's slightly too small. :(
Good overall cant beat the price. A bit on the more smaller size about sizing, but other than that good purchase.

I love Havaianas flip flops and thought I would save myself a trip and order online. They sent me the wrong size and due to my busy schedule I didn't have to time to return them. I ended up giving them to a friend.

They are great for the price. My wide toes fit perfectly. Make sure you get the regular ones instead of the narrow ones if you have this problem. The straps rubbed a little on the instep, but you just twist them a little and it's all better. I love the soft foot bed too. I will be getting more. I wear a 7 or 7 1/2 depending on shoes.
Not that great smaller than expected returning them I don't know what all the hype is with them? Found others that are better support and comfortable
I love the brand but buying them online can be a bit of a hit and miss. The sizes can vary slightly. We had to return them because they were slightly smaller than the size indicated.
Great fit, easy to care for & quite stylish - especially given the simplicity of the design. Definitely worth the money.
The site specified "mens", so I bought them.  Women's size was delivered.  I gave them to my wife.  I will be looking elsewhere for my own pair.

Got these for the gym shower and they get the job done. No frills but sturdy. I've used them for several months now and they don't show signs of much wear. I would definitely purchase these again for the same purpose.

Lasted about, oh, like 2 months with pretty solid wear and tear. College student here, I wear these around pretty damn often, like whenever I don't feel like putting on socks. So... pretty good usage, but NOT WORTH.

They arrived, and when I put them on they are definately NOT an 11-12 Mens size. They are more like a 9 or 10 in Mens. While this isn't the end of the world, they are not going to be as comfortable.

If you have large feet, these are not the product for you, or ensure that you are able to get the appropriate size.

They will, however, work for my needs (gym showers), and I'll deal with the... ahem... small footprint.

I bought this sandal based on other reviews. They are thicker than the cheapies you can find at Old Navy, much more bounce to them. I recommend these as a casual, daily sandal. I would not use for long distances, like spending the day at an amusement park or anything though.
I just love Havaiana flip flops.  They are perfect for summer time comfort.  They actually get more comfortable the more you wear them.  Amazon has lots of colors to choose from.

I like Hawaianas flip flops, they are cute. Someone posted that you should go with one size higher. I did that, but i'm not sure if it was necessary. Now they are just a little too large...it's not too bad though.
This is my second pair from this brand, THey are comfortable and wear well. I love them and would buy again.

Great for the pool area! I wear these to water aerobics where the deck and dressing room floors are slick.  These are great non-slip shoes.  Also just wore them to the beach in Mexico!  Will be buying more in different colors!

Worked as expected. Good, clear.
I really recommend those Brazilians flip flop.
Good price, good shape, good color.
Thank you
They fit like a glove!!! Runs true to size!!! Comfy and great for casual wear!!! Can't beat the 50% off price either!!!
I always thought size 41 was US 10 but on the pair I have it says 41-42 US 9. So go up a size.
I love these flip flops to use in showers such as gyms, hotels, pools, etc. I bought this one to use in my stay at the hospital during my delivery.
My dog keeps destroying these, and I keep buying them. They are my favorite pair of shoes, and I won't buy another brand of flip flops as long as Havaiana stays in business. Keep up the great work!
There is nothing quite like haviannas. They are the most comfortable flip flop around. I plan on purchasing more of them.

Best flip flops I own and great value for the price. They maintain their support and don't wear away as quickly as other flops do, They are comfortable. Nothings better then putting on a brand new pair.
I do my exercising at a local pool. This product helps me walk between shower and pool without slipping on the wet poolside surface. They are a good fit for my feet. Comfortable and safe.

Ok, so this black pair of what was supposed to be authentic Havaianas is not authentic.  First off, the bottom of the flip flop just says Havaianas in a circle without the word "Top".  The sizes listed on the footbed differ from every other pair of Havaianas I have ever bought, and I have bought a lot.  I bought these to make a crystal pair as a gift.  I gave them to her this past Monday and today, she sent me a picture of the strap that had already came through the hole.  Also, she said the straps were really loose and she was afraid they were going to come out when she was walking and that just happened today.  These are most definitely not true authentic Havaianas. I won't buy them on Amazon anymore.  Very dissapointed.

Great, simple flip flop.
Stays on well and is comfortable.
Definitely recommend as a summer shoe or to wear around the house!

I was sent a pair of flip-flops that were a whole size smaller than the size I ordered. I even double checked my receipt to make sure I hadn't made a mistake. I live in Ecuador, and had these sandals shipped to a friend who brought them down to me when they came to visit, so it's not like I could return them.
I ordered the 37/38/7-8 US but in actuality they're a US 6 (says it right on the shoe!)  I would love to return them, but they make it difficult to do and they don't have my size in stock.
average flip flop, not especially comfortable and quite small. 11-12 was exact fit for me even though I wear a size 9.

I got these flip flops as shower shoes for my dorm, and I'm impressed! The base of the shoe is surprisingly sturdy. My other flip flops have always fallen apart at the "toe holder," but these seem stronger. They aren't stylish or fancy, but they were just what I needed. Just one point about sizing--I usually wear a size 6 and the 37/38 (US 7/8) fits me well. I'd recommend ordering a size up from your regular shoe size.

My Tops had worn out over the years of wear and tear.  They do last quite a while, but not forever.  Everything went great.  It helps to know what the sizes actually mean (due to my previuos experience with the company).  41/42 Mens or Womens are about a size 10 in Mens.
Not only these flip flops arrived earlier than expected, but they only fit perfectly! They seem to be made of solid material that won't wear out too quickly.

When I first saw how expensive Havaianas were I thought there was no way I would pay that much money for a piece of rubber.  Then one day at a friends house I accidentally put on her paid instead of my $5 old navy flip flops and I completely changed my mind.  These are much much thicker, much more comfortable and much more durable.  Where a pair of old navy flip flops will last half a summer these will last you at least two summers.  Worth every penny.
The size on the label package was correct 7/8 and after opening the plastic bag, it show that the flip flop sandle was the wrong size 5/6 to small for two orders.
I wear a true size 8 in all my shoes. I bought this women's size 7-8 flip flop and it's too small. It comes right to the edge of my heel, maybe 0.25" under my heel. I exchanged for the next size up.

does not fit...at all! 2 or sizes too small. did not clearly state it was Women's at time of ordering. Only now after the fact, do I find out.
nice respectable amazon dealer...but harsh fit.

These flip flops have caused me to fall twice so far because my foot slipped off them sideways.  I know this is common with flip flops, but I haven't had this problem with other brands.  I feel the price I paid was not a good value.  They are comfortable though, but I have to walk carefully in them and that makes it a bit inconvenient.  I'll use them in the future, but not much.
The flip flops were exactly what I wanted and they are very true to size.  If you are a 10 1/2 you need to size up.

I love this brand of flip flops.  They are cute and pretty durable.  With some flip flops you can feel every bump in the road when you walk.  Not with these.  So comfortable.... Love the decent price.  I wear them everywhere in the summer time.
I have several of these in different colours.... I just needed a bran new pair of white ones. LOVE THEM
Havaianas are the only flip flops I will wear. These are extremely comfortable and fit perfectly. I would definitely recommend these.
Good quality and comfortable, they are my favorite brand of flip flops, I recommend them highly and own several pairs
They are the best. I have had many pairs and these just work. They are also rather rugged I picked up a second pair because they are so good.

I ordered the 5/6 and I usually wear a size 6.  They fit fine (wouldn't want any smaller though) and the best thing, they are very comfy.  I got navy blue color which is really more like in betwwen royal blue and navy.

Havaianas women's sizing chart is WRONG!
39/40 is a 7/8 ... NOT a 9/10! When I received these
the shoes are clearly marked 7/8.

I had gotten a pair of this brand, from a friend, who went to Brazil. Loved them!! Much softer then other flip flops. Ordered the same size that was on original pair. The strap was huge, and didn't feel the same. I was very disappointed. And, unfortunately, I bought 2 pair! I had to give them away. Total waste of money. I will think twice, and investigate, the product before I purchase, next time.

I love, love, love these flip flops. I purchased these to replace another pair of black Havaianas I had for about three years that had broken. I have them in multiple colors. I have shin splints and most flip flops bother them, but I find this brand super comfy and long-lasting.

I live in Florida so I wear flip flops probably 360 days out of the year.  I can't stand the cheap dollar flip flops because they always fall apart.  It was so bad I used to have to keep spare shoes in my trunk.  I finally decided to pay more and get a decent flip flop.  I first bought crocs flip flops and they were heavenly!  Unfortunately they stopped making them and I had to find something else, so that is why I decided to try Havaianas.

I was scared to buy these online without seeing them because they look just like the cheap ones. That is the beauty of it.  They look like basic plain flip flops, but they are really well made.  They are very comfortable so far!  I have done lots of walking in them and they are winners.  I will probably buy a few more in different colors because I like them so much.
Shoes is very light, wearing comfortable, buy a little bit big, hope to provide a complete, more detailed size table, you can more accurately choose!
I love Haviannas my last pair lasted five years.  They are the best flip flops in the world and I would recommend them to everyone who wears floppies.

These flip flops were exactly what I wanted. They fit very comfortably. Eventually I will order the same style in another color. I am very pleased with them.

Patricia

These flip flops are one of a kind goodness. I have been wearing this brand for 12 years now and all other flip flops pale in comparison. I would recommend them to everyone and anyone! I do prefer the regular ones over the slim ones but those are nice too.

I needed another pair of Havaianas, but I don't live near a Nordstroms anymore, so had to buy them online.  The size I currently have was not listed so I went with what I thought was the closest.  They're a bit small, but they work.
Arrived promptly in two days. Fit is excellent. They feel fine on my feet! I just wish they'd had more colors in my size. I'm using these as my everyday house, yard shoe during the summer.

I bought these and a pair of Reef flops at the same time. I like the Reef ones better, they are more comfortable and not plastic. The Havaianas are more plastic like so they are easier to clean though. They are decently comfortable, nothing amazing, but better than those hard flops or super thin ones.

These shoes are great! My last pair lasted me 5 summers! This year I really started to notice the wear so I ordered a new pair. I love them. They are worth the price and the price on Amazon is the best around!

I had a pair of these before that I wore all of the time. They were very comfortable and fit great, but after years of wear, they needed replaced. The straps on one of the shoes that I received are crooked and hurts my foot to wear; therefore, I cannot wear them.
They don't call havaianas the most comfortable flip flop for nothing! These feel like you're walking on air, I had no blisters the first time I wore them.
Love my Havaianas! I have owned several pair and even gave as a gift. The price is right. They have never disappointed me.

One of the shoes came with the straps twisted and they don't untwist unless you put your foot in the shoe. They are very cheaply made, but we only bought the shoes to take to summer camp as shower shoes, so they are perfect for that.

Love my havaiianas...this is my third pair in 8 years.
Settled for an "Old Navy" $3 pair for the past 2 years but they were so uncomfortable.
Got the white ones, they came as expected. I am usually a 7.5-8 and I got the 37/38 size (FOR WOMEN'S!) and they fit perfectly just as I expected them too.

These are the really cushy basic ones that have a nice grippy texture without looking too technical.
The white ones are great for summer color shorts, basic dresses. and jeans!
They arrived perfectly on time. Thank you, Amazon!
My favorite flip flops.  They fit well and are super comfortable!  These were a replacement for a previous pair that I wore out from wearing every day in the summer for several years in a row.

This was the first time I purchased (or tried on) Havaianas, and I it was a bitter sweet moment...  Firstly, they are extremely comfortable. Secondly, they run small.  I tried to convince myself that they would be fine (I didn't want to return them!), but in the end I made the right decision and sent them back.  Returning them was an extremely smooth process.

I ended up purchasing the next size up and I'm glad I did.  They fit wonderfully!  I love these shoes, I already purchased a second color, perfect for summer, very comfortable!
perfect for anywhere. i love the black color. and also it lasts for long time to compare with other brands flip flops

I just received these yesterday and the second I put them on they were fantastic!  I understand why people love this brand of shoes so much.  I plan to buy more after I gauge how they wear.  Would love to have more colorful pairs, but wanted to start with classic black.  Note to self:  must hide from GSD Schatzi - do NOT want her to get her teeth into these... BUY THEM!
This is my 3rd pair in 2 summers. They are not made how they used to be. My very first pair lasted me 5 years, now these barely last a season. Still very comfy
The first thing I do when I get home is kick off my shoes and slip on my flip flops. They are very comfortable and great for walking around our garden.
These Flip Flops hurt the bottom of my feet and I have to wear arch support shoes now. It wasn't worth the pain!!!
These are my "go to" sandals for summer. Love them & wish they were a little more affordable, but I guess if I'm willing the shuck out $20, a whole lotta people are!

These are the very best....just like the Flip Flops of my youth....by that I mean the '70's. The soles are flexible. You can actually walk in these Flip Flops and not end up in hospital.  There are colors galore but I had to get black because I wore my last black pair out last summer.

Try 'em. You'll love 'em.

The experience with Amazon was excellent. However, I was very disappointed in the actual quality, texture and comfort of the flip flop. Unfortunately, for all the hype and promotional advertising, I was expecting more from the product.  It felt like I was wearing a stiff, crunchy rough tire tread.

This is my second pair as I wore the first ones out. These are good, basic sandals and do not hurt your feet. I've never needed to break them in; they are comfortable from the start. I'd buy them again.

I was skeptical about these sandals even after many if my friends love them. All rubber sandals I've had in the past gave me blisters. I order just one pair to try them. I love them.  Order 3 additional pair. Really comfy, cute, and affordable. I'm sold!
These are the only flip flops I will wear. They are so comfortable. I have multiple pairs and wear them all summer. They provide foot support while feeling cushy at the same time.
I love these flip flops! They are so comfortable and they will be the only ones I buy from here on out.
So glad I purchased these. They fit perfectly and are so comfortable! Looking forward to fun in the sun all summer long!

so this whole brazilian and US size of sandals is really confusing. i am a size 7 so i went on google and searched up size 7 women into brazilian or whatever, and it gave me this size - BR/7-8. so i thought hey, what is there to lose, i can always exchange if they don't fit! but... no need to- they fit! so nicely, and believe me they are the real thing-not "fakes". :)
My favorite flip-flops ever! Comfortable and long lasting. Haven't purchased or worn any other brand for years! I pretty much also only purchase black!

I loved these flip flops until they failed after 4 months...For 18 bucks, I expect to get 2 seasons out of these!

10/1/13:
I purchased these flip flops for $17.99 in May '13 and the top of
the toe thong on the right flip flop broke yesterday. :(

I love my flip flops and spent extra money to buy a good pair. Based on customer reviews on Amazon, these were the ones to get! They fit well, are very comfortable, and seemed to made better than the rest.

I kept checking the bottom of the flip flop to see how much they had worn down and was confident that I had spent my money wisely. The bottom of the shoe (where most flip flops fail) was barely noticely worn at all! These seem to made from more durable materials so I don't know why they failed on the TOP of the toe thong.

I tried to contact Havainas and you are SOL on a replacement unless they've been purchased within the last 30 days! Can't even speak to a real live person! Havaianas customer service is the pits! I'll never buy another pair I'll just buy a couple cheapo rubber made pairs from my local store and they'll definately last for at least 2 seasons. I'm so dissapointed.
The most comfortable flip flop I have owned! The top flip flop is better than the slim as far as comfort.
The black color is awesome. It is very comfortable to wear them, and they fit almost any cloth. Very great.

My favorite flip flops EVER. Couldn't go a summer without them. This will be my 4th pair of Havaianas- my most recent ones lasted a good 3 or 4 years, and I am very hard on my shoes. These flip flops are almost spongy, very easy to walk in & don't leave those blisters where the straps are. I've never had any problems with any of my flip flops, and I have VERY wide feet. Love!
Went out of town, forgot other shoes! Had to wear these the whole time and loved them! Will buy another pair or 3!

Got my typical size in sandals, size 8 and they fit perfect. In boots I'm a 9, in sneakers I'm 8.5, but for sandals or fitflops I'm an 8. If you're normally a size 8.5 then you'd be safe sizing DOWN for these. I wear these in the shower and they do not cause me to slip on wet floors. Would recommend to anyone wanting a durable comfortable simple sandal. Will be getting another pair for my boyfriend in the summer.
the simple Havaianas you cant find in the store. Initially they fit small butb the plastic gives in with time.
I intend to order many more of these.  I love the way they fit and that they're a bit thicker/heavier than your standard flip flop.  They will definitely be the "go-to shoe" in my weekend wardrobe.
Best flip flops for the price. Comfortable, don't give me blisters, and last for a long time. Have both the thin and regular strap!
These have to be the best flips flops ever!! I have bought other flips and NONE come close to comparing to these!! I have them in all colors!! Love 'em!

I have many pairs from years ago so I ordered these hoping they would be the same. They did not disappoint and were as comfy as my old ones. They feel lighter than my old ones and are a great navy color which is what I was looking for.

Havaianas are the most comfortable rubber slippers I have ever worn.  What makes them so great, especially the classics, is that they have a sole that is the perfect combination of flexibility and stiffness.  Once you break them in they form to your feet and you feel like you have nothing on.  I have hiked, swam, walked, biked, etc. in these slippers.  Plus, I am rather clumsy and would trip a lot in other sandals because the sole was so stiff.  Not Havaianas!!!  My whole family, men and women swear by them and want no others.  I highly recommend them.
They keep their form. They are very well made. Great colors to choose from. The only flip flops I wear.
Exactly as ordered.  Best Flip Flops on the planet!  Been wearing for over 10 years refuse to wear any other!

It shipped very fast. It doesn't feel like any other cheap flip flop. It feels "heavy".
It's also very comfortable and very true to size.
I hope it lasts as long as everyone says it does.
Long lasting and comfortable. I have bought cheap flip flops that don't last a season and I end up spending more having to replace them. I love them!
I love these slippers. I've had several pair over the years and always buy more. Very comfortable and great for everyday.
I'm obsessed with wearing flip flops. Havaianas are the most comfortable flip flops I own. I wear them everyday! I recommend them to any person obsessed with flip flops
These are the most solid flip flops out there. Havianas run true to size and come in great colors. They arrived quickly.

I have 2 other pairs of Havaianas and these new ones just don't seem to be made quite the same way.  The straps are twisted at an odd angle so they don't lie flat against the foot and they're wider-set than the older ones.  Maybe just a glitch?
these flip flops are amazing! they're super comfortable, they don't irritate my feet and they go with just about every summer outfit I have! a must for all beach bums! :)
These flip flops look great & feel great. Who could ask for more? I even ordered more in different colors.
I LOVE Havianas Tops but, this pair - in the same size that I have ordered before - was too small. Very disappointed. Reordered from Zappos, hope they get it right.

I had been told about these by my family and friends for awhile and finally decided to give them a shot and I am so glad I did. They are without question the best pair of flip flops I have ever owned. The traction is great, they are well made and they NEVER ever stink no matter what. I love how comfortable they are and look forward to buying several more pairs when summer approaches next year. BUY THESE SANDALS!!!
I think the sizes have changed as these are larger than the last 37/38 ones I had. Regardless, Havaianas are really comfortable though you need new ones every few years.

Standard, good Havaianas. Not sure if it's the exact same pair as I got from Nordstrom, but this one seemed to have less thickness/less sturdy than the Havaianas I'd gotten at Nordstrom. Still a comfortable pair.

These have been my favorite summer footwear since I bought my first pair of brown havaianas in Australia 9 years ago! They are soooo comfortable- I finally broke down and bought a second pair of black ones since they've gotten more wear. These treat your feet much better than the cheap Old Navy ones and considering they last so long the price isn't bad either.

I bought these to give as a gift and the receiver loved them except they were a size too small so I had to ship them back.  I have always liked Havaianas though so it was no surprise that the person I gave it to really liked them too.
The flip flops are so comfortable and the best that I have ever worn.  The workmanship is very good product and the shiping was fast.

I bought these for my wife who absolutely loves them.  They're simple yet well built that I think she'll be able to wear them for quite some time.

Edit: Third time buying these just recently. They last about two years of regular use before they finally go which I think is great. Purchased in 2012, 2014, and 2016. Looking forward to buying them again in 2018.

I've tried many sandals and these havaianas are so comfortable! I love the feel of them, the only problem I might have is the sizing. They have different sizes, the sizes for US vs the sizes they list as Havaianas are different, I wanted just the plain medium but it wasn't in stock so I chose the medium in Havaiana style and they're a bit short. Still fit great but it probably would've been better in the US medium. Great sandals though!! And totally inexpensive!! I may just get another pair
I ordered two pair for an upcoming cruise. Have worn them both to the beach.  They are comfortable, true to size and easy to shake the sand off of!!
Wanted these for when I get out of the pool.  They work great for that and dry fast. Also quite comfortable.

This is like my 5th pair of these flip flops and I just love them. Because they are quality made you never have to worry about them turning your feet the color of the flip flop like the cheaper ones do. Very comfortable too!
Love Havaianas!!  The color was exactly as pictured. The thing I like the most about this product is the variety of colors that are offered.  I am happy with my purchase.

I first bought my first pair of black Havaianas about 5 years ago and i honestly still have them.

They are still as comfortable and look great as when i first bought them from the store even though I've worn them so much from going to the beach, pool, vacation, to the grocery store, shopping, checking mail, running errands, yeah the list is endless and they still are good to go except the bottom sole which finally made me have to buy news ones.

I do find that the sizing runs a little "bigger" then what it used to but i really do not mind it one bit. The news are just as great and identical to the ones i bought so many years ago and have absolutely loved. I know a lot of people are going to be like are you kidding me that's disgusting keeping them same pair for so many years.....hmmhmh...NO! It isn't since the style is identical no one knows how long you've had them for, for starters and since they weren't worn out why would i replace them until i actually had to?

I probably have almost all the available colors by now and i do favor the top flip flop style compared to the others one available but that it is just my personal opinion.

You get beyond a bang for your buck on this pair!! I DEFINITELY recommend and would buy again and again and again...Simply love these flip-flops! Super comfortable, stylish and literally everlasting.

I own several pairs of Havaianas and was a little concerned about ordering them online after perusing the reviews.  I decided to go ahead and order a pair in same size as my other ones, a 39/40, and they fit perfectly. All of the other pairs I own I bought in person, so I had the benefit of trying them on ahead of time. I hadn't realized that a 39/40 translates to a size 9/10, so it would appear that these do run large. I am a true size 8 in all of my other shoes but I am apparently a 9/10 in Havaianas.

I would recommend that before ordering them online you try them on in person if possible to guarantee size accuracy. They are much cheaper on amazon than in other retail stores I've been to so I am very pleased with my purchase. I find them to be more comfortable and durable than any other flip flop brand. I've had my other pairs for years and have put them through a lot of abuse and they still look and feel great. If you have very sensitive feet or are prone to sweating, these may not be the right sandal for you. Because they are rubber, they are easy to clean and never smell like other foam flip flops.
I love these flip flops!!  They're a stronger, great quality rubber and are true to size.  I want to order more of these in different colors.

I have been using Haviana's for multiple years now and they usually last me a minimum of a year.  I find that they are the right price for the duration of time it lasts.  I will continue to buy haviana's for years to come.  The price is only a few cents less than purchasing it from other retailers but amazon's shipping always makes it easier to just arrive at my door step.  If you are looking for a good quality flip flop and buy multiple pairs over the course of a year then this is your one stop, look no further havianas is the way to go.

I ordered these almost two years ago, and they've finally broken. The top part of the slipper that goes between the big toe and the second toe broke apart from the sole of the slipper. I have been using these as shower slippers and bedroom slippers since I stay in a college dormitory. They were fairly comfortable once they were worn in.
i wear these flip flops all the time. love the brand. love them in this color and other colors. will def buy again.

I bought these to use as shower shoes at the gym.  I didn't give a lot of thought about people's comments that they are super comfortable because that wasn't a concern.  So I was pleasantly surprised to find out that they are indeed comfortable.  Not that I have walked all that much in them (from the locker to the shower), but I think those other reviewers might be right.  As for a shower shoe, they are perfect. They do not hold water and they dry off easily.  I am really glad that I purchased them and will probably buy another pair for this summer.

I've heard a lot of good reviews about Havaianas, so when making a flip flop purchase I decided to give it a try. I was not disappointed. I've owned several different flip flops, but Havaianas has been the best for giving both style and comfort. The only downside to my purchase is ordering the wrong size. Besides that, this was a great purchase and I'm considering ordering more in the near future.
I purchased these for my wife who is a big fan of flip flops. She reports these are the very best money can buy.

These are my favorite flip flops.  Even though they are no frills, they have the best foam are are super comfortable.  This was just a backup pair, my old ones will stay in the gym bag now.  Happy to see these on Amazon and for such a great price.  Thanks!
This product worked great on some jeans that needed stretching.  A little awkward to figure out at first, but once in place, the stretching was perfect and solved the size problem just fine.
Product works very well. I found it best to get the item nearly dry,then wet the waistband and use it.

I have used this product for over 1 year and love it.  I use it for my husbands jeans.  I dry them completly, then I wet the waits band completely and stretch the waist band where he needs it stretched in the morning and by the evening they are dry and comfortable for him.  I have also used them on one pair of my jeans that tend to have a smaller waist.  Once dry the jeans are very comfortable to wear.  Would highly recommend to anyone.

I have this product and it works great.  It saved me from having to purchase new jeans.  I am slim through the hips and thighs and find that jeans that fit in the hips are too tight in the waist, leading to the dreaded "muffin top".  I don't use the waistband stretcher when the jeans are wet from the wash.  I dry them in the dryer, then lightly dampen them with a spray bottle before inserting the stretcher.  I find that they dry and stretch to the right size in a few hours.

It's difficult to use and when used on wet pants left to dry overnight --- it doesn't work. I might as well wear wet pants for the entire day until it dries for better results. I DEMAND A REFUND AND YOU PAY S & h!

I love this ring.  I purchased it as my wedding band to use until I can afford to buy the real deal.  This set is really beautiful, and I have worn it everyday since being married, haven't taken it off and it is still sparkling.

I would recommend this set to anyone who is after a beautiful setting, that looks real and looks lovely on your finger, not to mention you can't beat the price.

Regards
Jody

Lovely piece of jewelry, BUT...What the photo doesn't clearly show is that one of the rings in this 3-ring set has larger stones than the other two. Not a big deal really, but I think there should be some clarification in the product description.
Love the Eternity ring. Very pleased worth mSterling Silver Cubic Zirconia Stacking Eternity Bandsore than what it cost.

I absolutely LOVE this set of 3 stacking sterling silver eternity bands.  The "middle" band has a bit larger stones than the other two, which I didn't realize upon purchasing, however it looks outstanding.  I wear all 3 or just 1 band daily and get so many compliments!  I have also matched up 2 bands with other rings that I have.  This was an incredible find and an even better buy!  I love the rings!

Love this ring! For me the ring runs a little bit bigger in size than I expected, but that won't stop me from wearing it. The way it looks and the way it sparkles in the light makes it look like an expensive high quality ring. I'm very pleased!

These rings look really nice and they won't turn green. One of the three bands has larger stones in it than the other 2 which is fine, but one of the stones fell out of the band within the first 3 months I had it.  I only use 2 of the bands to go with my real diamond and I love the added effect!  The bands were very inexpensive so it wasn't a big deal that one lost a stone.  All in all it was worth the purchase.
Love these rings!  I wear them everyday!

I got these to wear as my wedding band as I work in healthcare & wash my hands about 50 times every day so I didn't want to drop tons of money on an expensive ring that might get ruin by the harsh sanitizer. I've wore this band everyday for the past 9 months and it still looks amazing! People never believe that it isn't real. The rose gold still has perfect color! Definitely recommend 10/10.

I wore the slightly larger of the 3 as my wedding band & I just replaced it with one of the other ones as my band. I still definitely recommend this set! Very, very nice for the price!!

Stones fell out within 2 weeks except one of them. Looked great..great packaging..poor quality.

Disappointed. Didn't live up to my expectations

1) The size DOES run very small. I am a Size 9. I ordered a Size 9. Wearing 1 of these rings by itself, fit comfortably. Wearing 2 of these rings stacked together, fit VERY tightly, and were VERY hard to get off. Wearing all 3 of these rings stacked together, did NOT fit at all. 2) The sides DO stick out. Which IS noticeable, looks-wise, AND comfort-wise. 3) The "Middle Ring" IS warped. It is NOT straight across the bottom. It is wavy on the bottom. 4) I have had Diamond, and CZ, stacked eternity band style rings before, and these rings do NOT measure up. Not even *1* of these rings, is worth keeping all 3 of them. I will say, however, that they are very sparkly. And, I'm disappointed, that they didn't work out. I wish that they were better made. I was really looking forward to receiving these rings, and liking them, and keeping them. But, after receiving these rings in person, I have to return them.
