These rings are great for travel where you don't want to take your treasured gems. Hard to tell the difference from real diamonds. I even mix them with colored stones for a change.
loved the rings, the look and feel good on my finger.. I'd buy again.. a size seven was perfect. it looks great stacked with other rings individually also..
They're replacing lost wedding bands that we can't afford to buy at this time.  Looks good and I love them.
Opened the package and "Ahh, what beautiful rings" Just couldn't take my eyes off their sparkle and shine. So brilliant looking.

I have been looking for a right hand ring for over a year and ordered this set to wear until I find "the right one". I gotta admit, I love these bands so much I won't be spending a few grand on the LaVian I was hours away from ordering. I receive compliments on it and can wear one band on a casual day or all three to the office. Well worth double or triple what you pay!
These are really pretty my only issue is that they are a bit uncomfortable as they rub against the other fingers but the are very nice and look real.
i got this cause my diamond wedding band was stolen. this is a great option until i get my new one. it sparkles, is shiny and does the trick.
Looks really good. The problem is that was to small. My ring size is 6 but, was to uncomfortable. So if you want to buy this product buy the next size, not your actual size.

This is a perfect ring for the price and quality. Wear this stunning piece everyday.  Sparkles nonstop and never tarnishes, looks extremely real and elegant! Lost the first one so sad I immediately purchased another!!!!!
Beautiful rings. I have gotten several compliments on it--all thinking that diamonds are not CZ. Perfect way to add inexpensive bling to my finger!

I absolutely love them!  Shipped fast!

I wear two of them together or even all three on my ring finger.

They look elegeant and real.

These rings are very beautiful and flashy. As expected they were quite perfect, one of the rings was warped slightly, but that is to be expected from the price. The lady didn't really mind as she just gave the rings away to friends as friendship rings.

I purchased these rings to wear until I lose weight and can get my wedding rings on... but when that happens I'm just moving them to my other hand, they're beautiful! Very sparkly and the perfect size!

I bought these years ago and I am still wearing them.  I love that they are not connected, so I can wear all 3 or just 1 or 2.  They look fantastic!  I have gotten lots of compliments on them.  Very good buy!!

My husband wanted to but me an anniversary ring with budget of 5-10 thousand when I found this ring and truly it is so gorgeous and looks like such real sparkly diamonds I told him to save that money for retirement and I'll wear this ring!!
I get so many compliments !!!
Love my new rings!  Very pretty and sparkly, especially for the price!  Great addition to my wedding band. Size was exact as well.
These are a great alone, grouped or with a mix of other rings.  Always receive compliments.  Very pleased with these rings
Love these.  They are  Perfect for pumping up effect of other rings.  Not as big as they appear in the photos but I expected that.

For the money you can not go wrong. I wear them 24/7 everyday and still look brand new. My wedding rings were too big so I ordered as a temporary fix to wear as a ring guard. I have put off buying real ones to match my REAL wedding rings as you can not tell the difference.
Well made and I love the stones in the middle ring are a bit larger than the other two. You can wear one or all three. I'm wearing them until I get my original set from the repair shop.
I am not pleased with this ring.  The ring has no color in the stones at all.  Also, there is the issue with it staying together.
I mixed these rings with real diamond stackables and they blend well, although I can pick out the real diamond,but from a distant they are beautiful
The ring looked nice.  I normally wear a size 8 ring, which was what I ordered, but the ring was too small so I returned it.  I didn't order a size 9, they were out of stock.

I ordered these stack rings as a stand-in wedding ring for vacations and anywhere i don't want to wear my real diamonds. They are quite lovely! Very sparkly and the stones seem to be very well set. The fit seems to be true. I usually wear a 6.5 on my left ring finger, and I ordered a 7 so i could have some flexibility and wear it on my right hand as well.

Oddly enough, one of the three bands has larger cz stones than the other two. It's not dramatic, but it's noticable. I don't really care, but i thought it was strange.

These are cool because you can stack them together, or separate them to enhance other rings.  I would give them 4 stars, but I think all these other reviews will make you think they are better than they actually are.  Don't get me wrong, they're cool, but calm down people.
Beautiful and elegant but was a little to small for the finger intended, have returned it and will be ordering a bigger size. Shipment was on time as expected.
gorgeous ring. Blings beautifully against my real diamond rings. I have received so many compliments as it shines and sparkles so nicely!
Not too flashy, exactly what I was looking for as a safe substitute for my actual wedding ring. Good packing also.
great ring set been wearing daily for 1 year looks wonderful and real. very happy with purchase will buy again.

Really don't understand some of the other reviewers that stated the rings were 'big'? They're meant to be worn by someone who can rock the chunkier looking stuff but they are not overly big in my book! The two outside rings are a tad smaller in stone size then the middle and they are fun to wear with other rings or stacked together on one finger. I think for the price and sterling silver no less, this is a great gift. Say you can buy it and give one to three of your friends! ;)

I got these so long ago and am just reviewing them now.  I wore them for months and gave them to my best friends daughter who has been wearing them for months now and never takes them off, not even to shower.  They still sparkle and shine.

It was a quick piece of costume jewelry I wanted to get for my wife, but she didn't like the fit. The ring isn't smooth and digs into her fingers so it's a piece of drawer jewelry now. For the price I can't be too upset, but not something I would buy if given a second chance.
Got this for a family member and they loved it! It fit and looked really nice and has lasted for a year now with the same nice gleam on it!

The size was correct even with three bands it fit great. Yes there is one band that the diamonds are bigger than the other two bands but placed in the middle you would hardly notice it. I just received the ring so I am looking forward to see how the simulated diamonds old up, in color and quality (not falling out etc).
This was her Surprise Christmas gift she was so shocked and happy! And everywhere she goes she gets compliments and I get that "Great Job!" approval!

I purchased these rings for my pinky finger and love them.  You can wear all three on one finger or break them up for both pinky fingers.  I have received quite a few compliments on them and they look like diamonds to the untrained eye.  Would highly recommend!
They are absolutely beautiful and I get compliments every time I wear them. Great value and beautiful - that's what I look for in my jewelry. Thanks Amazon!!

My wife got these for christmas and the stones are perfect. The only reason for 4 stars is the rings take a little getting used to because the stones go all the way around the finger. They can be worn with other rings or by itself. Looks very nice with just one ring also.
My wife picked this out and had it on her wish list. In my opinion, it looks as nice as anything you'll find a jewelry store for a lot more money.
Love these rings. I where them individually and I get a lot of compliments. Money well spent. Must have. No complaints from me
Beautiful rings, very realistic looking.  I wear them alone, or with other rings and they are a lovely addition to my collection.
True to size, just amazing! If your looking to replace your  set for vacation or just to have, this is the one!
First they have no luster!  Very dull stones, second they are very uncomfortable to wear!  Sad it was a waste of money, I am going to try to get a refund.

The diamond in my wedding ring was loose so I put it aside thinking I'll have it reset but into a different setting. Well, it's still sitting. So in the interim I want to wear a ring and have always been attracted to the stacked look. This set is sharp and fabulous. SO many compliments; more than I got with my original setting.  I'm hard on my hands. Working in the yard, overusing bleach (clean freak) and although this set is very affordable, it's also durable. The silver is as silver as the day it arrived and the simulated diamonds sparkle. It does NOT look cheap. Love it so much I'm in no hurry to get my diamond mounted in a new setting.

I was very apprehensive about ordering these, but I was pleased when they arrived.  yes, they are not real diamonds, and no, they do not look like I spent hundreds of dollars on the bands.  However, they look lovely as guards for my engagement ring (with one to spare).  For the price I'm pleased with them.
Wow!  You would think it is real!  Lots of compliments! Several people want my rings, so I told them to go on Amazon.
This was a great buy and I get many compliments.  Gives my wedding band a break from the day to day wear.
I love these rings. Great sparkle and bling. Just what I was looking for. Well made and sturdy - and price is good.
I was being a little skeptical about the sterling silver quality and decided to order them based on the good reviews. I really like them and recommend them.
Good for the price. Excellent for wearing at night. Looks kind of cheap in daylight Just a little too bulky
Just love these rings to put them next to my real diamond ring and you cannot even tell the difference
beautifully sparkle and brilliant to go with a solitaire ring  wear alone or all together  priced right for the quality
Great!  Love my rings.  They were too big at first but exchanged them for the right size and love them.

These stackable rings are gorgeous. I've only been wearing them for 4 days and still, they are bright and shiny. The feel was a bit awkward at first, as is usual with any new ring but now I can't even tell I'm wearing it. The day after I received these rings, I had to make a trip to the jeweler. Right away the jeweler commented, "What a beautiful ring." She didn't realize at first that it was sterling silver and cubic zirconia's. I recommend this ring for sure. It's stunning!

Definitely worth the price.  Extreme sparkle and very comfortable.  I've had many compliments only having for 4 days now.  I like the versatility of wearing only one band or all 3.  The prongs are well set and have not 'caught' on anything.  I wear it on the right hand  and would certainly purchase for a friend.
Love it. It's exactly what I wanted. Great quality and it genuinely looks real. Sizing is accurate and it arrived early.
These rings are beautiful and sturdy. I've not taken them off since they were delivered, and they've stood up to house cleaning, etc...i'm very happy my hubby got them for me!!!
beautiful rings, lots of sparkle and look very real.  I bought these to wear as a sub to my wedding rings. ( I've lost my wedding band twice and don't want to make it a 3rd time!)
very nice ring, I bought it for my girlfriend, she loved, she was delighted with the gift, the ring on her hand looks like a very nice

Great set of rings that will go casual or evening wear.  Purchased the set because of the sizing...have a hard time with getting rings over knuckles that fit properly.  With these rings being full circle they can spin and look fabulous at all times...

I was so impressed with these rings when I got them and find they look like the real thing, the sparkle the worksmanship everything. I would put them up against any of my expensive jewelery. In fact they look better than some.

These are SOOO much fun and they REALLY do sparkle!!  THe cut on the small stones is perfect for reflecting the light and color prisms.  One of the better things I have bought on here!!  Shipping was SUPER fast...

These are a great value. I bought them to work with some solitaires i own, and they make my other rings into beautiful wedding sets. They look great on their own as well. They are perfect in every way, and i am so happy and thrilled with my new rings. Love them
These were awesome, just what I was wanting and my granddaughters love them too, so I might have to order more

This is fairly nice, but when I received it, 2 of the 3 bands have tiny, tiny stones, and one has a bit larger stones. ?????????????
they didn't mention that in the description, I don't think. the picture is enlarged so much, you may be mislead into how tiny the stones really, are.

The picture of this ring or rings does not accurately depict it,But having said that I truly do LOVE it anyway!!! I get a ton of compliments ,and it's very sparkly......For the money what more could you ask for? BUY BUY BUY IT

This ring is really pretty. I wear all 3 bands at one time. I've read some reviews that say it's uncomfortable because it's too big but I don't find that to be an issue at all. I'd recommend this ring to anybody looking for something inexpensive but that doesn't look obviously fake.
I love these stackable rings. Would buy as a gift for some else. I might even get myself another set. Looks real and best yet no one can tell.

I received my rings on Saturday and have worn them every day.  The stones are small enough to be belivable and the sparkle is great.  I paired them with my real sapphire and diamond eternity ring and they stole the show.  Everyone thinks they are my new anniversary present and what they don't know won't hurt them.  Grab these while you can.

This ring is just as it appears in the picture. Very shiny and pretty, looks real too and not fake. I have long fingers so it is perfect on my hand and it is true to size as well, I ordered a 7 and that is exactly what it is. However it is big between the fingers and a little rough at first. It took some getting use to but now I don't even know its on there. I am wearing this as a wedding band and it is beautiful. I gave this 5 stars because of the price, you get a lot of Bang and Bling for your buck! It was shipped quick and on time.

Tonya

The three on my finger together, hurt my finger.  They fit, but look ugly & clutsy big.  I have turned two into a pair of earrings, And the third one is a necklace now.  That's the only creative thing I could do with them.  They are no good as rings the way they are made.  I like, (not love) the three this way.
Thought these rings were nice  in viewing, but they were even nicer when I received them. I gave one to my daughter who was especially pleased. Special occasion ring perhaps.

i wear these when i want to leave my wedding bands at home; they look very expensive and are made well - none of the little CZ have fallen out.  however, they dig into your fingers - kind of a rough surface.  but overall a good purchase esp at this pricepoint.

The quality and beauty of these rings were far greater than I expected. So, so sparkly! The rings are true to size. I am only wearing one because, with the incredible amount of sparkle, one is more than enough for me. All three of them together make a stunning statement, but overkill for my skinny fingers for a daytime look. Just beautiful.
I really love them. I wear them everyday & just bought a set for my mother. Might buy another set soon.

These rings were beautiful but I had to return them as they were
too small.  I have many rings in a size 5 so I don't know why they
didn't fit.

I bought these because of all of the reviews that said they looked real but I'm not sure if these people don't know what real jewelry looks like or got a different product than me. What I got looks exactly like the picture, and the stones are so cheap and cheesy looking I was embarrassed I even made the purchase. I have a few diamond bands for comparison and there really just was no comparison, at all, everything about these rings did not do it for me. I returned them.
These rings were worth the price. I can wear them alone or sandwich my solitaire between them. They sparkle just as much as my real diamonds. I haven't received any compliments yet but I love them.

I was very impressed by how realistic the rings looked.  The band width and size of the  cz's  make the ring look like the real thing.  The rings are very comfortable to wear and can be worn together, singly, or with other rings for a different stackable look.  The size was accurate.

I bought this set to wear with my three stone ring. I love them. They are not all the same size. There are two of the same size and the third one is larger by 1mm. I've been wearing them for two weeks now and so far I've had no problems with them. A real keeper.
I tried on the rings and found them to look a little gawdy.  They were rather bulky, and fit loose considering that they were my ring size.
These look great and looked every bit the diamond rings they were supposed to mimic. Wife was very happy and uses it frequently without having to worry about it.
This jewelry is absolutely gorgeous. I love my rings and have been wearing them every day! Great purchase! I might order another set!
But you can tell they are not real. Obviously if I had more disposable income I would be buying the real ones. However, they are sparkly and I like them.

Was pleasantly surprised when I opened my package!  I read through most of the reviews before deciding to purchase these rings but I'm glad that I did.  They are really nice and I have gotten a lot of compliments.  Of course you can tell they are not real but they are still gorgeous!  They do run probably a size too big though.  I ordered size 7 which i normally wear but they were a bit big.  I still love them though.  I would highly recommend this product if you are looking for a little special something for yourself.
I love wearing my stacking eternity bands, and boy do they sparkle in the light.  I, often times, will catch people staring at them without noticing it.  Definately an eye catcher!

I like these rings because the stones are no so big that they don't look real.
in the middle ring the stones are a little bit bigger though.
I ordered these to wear a costume jewelry but the size 7 was a little big maybe a 7.5 fit.
Everyone love it its better then cubic zirconium and its a price u can afford its just great for the wife
poor quality, no sparkle  I have sent it back. not what i expected no luck with jewlery . product needs improvement
I love these rings.  I can wear them in so many different ways---one, two, or three at a time or add other bands with them.  Friends ask me if they are "real".  Diana
What an amazing looking set of rings.  Love it!  I get tons of compliments. One of the best buys I have made.
I love this set of rings.  I can wear them together or just one with my engagement ring.  I would recommend to anyone.
I bought this ring for myself. It is very pretty. My teenage daughters were jealous and wanted it for themselves.

Just got my bands and they're nice. At first it seemed to look costumy and I noticed what the the other reviews on how one of the 3 rings don't stack up was talking about.  But as the day passed it grew on me and i figured out a way to wear it so that it stacks well.  I wear it on my middle finger so it doesn't feel so bulky.  If i wear in on my ring finger it looks too big.

I have gotten SO many compliments on this ring its kinda crazy. I have a beautiful wedding set but this trumps it. I get so many more compliments on this instead. My friend works at a jewellery store (has for 11 years, and I buy ALL my diamonds and real jewellery from her), and she asked me where I got it, she loved it so much I gave her my other one (my husband bought me the same set but a few sizes too small). For the price this is a beautiful ring! I wear it when I dress up, or even when I am wearing jeans and a sweater. Its so beautiful it goes with everything. It hasn't turned my finger green or anything which I am prone too, and I wear this ring almost everyday. It is "diamonds" all the way around so that took some getting used to, but other than that, I definitely recommend this!
Beautiful rings. I didn't know what to expect, however I was surprised. I love them. Thanks you  again so much.

Bought this to substitute for the real thing on vacation. I put it next to my real diamonds and they would fool anyone's naked eye. I had to return a few others because they were awful, but this was not a waste of time or money.

I was very pleasantly surprised when I received the ring set. They sparkle like crazy( but believable!) As others have mentioned, one of the rings has slightly larger stones... Which I am not thrilled with but all the rings are beautiful and for the price, I can't really complain! I even paired it with my real set and it stands up pretty well! My diamonds are colorless and the ring set appears colorless also, so I think the ring set might not pair as well with diamonds that are a little warmer in color tone. I only wish they had half sizes as the size5 is just a tad large, but other then that, I love these rings! I got them as a stand in for my wedding set while we are in Mexico and I can't wait to wear them!!
not much sparkle...but on either side of ring like look ok..so i am keeping..but quality is just fair..i like to add eternity bands to existing rings, as some thin rings need more bling.
i wear this ring set quite often~ it looks fantastic! i also mix and mingle other sack rings with color as well.

i had no idea this was not diamond
i have never in my life worn cubics.. i gave them to my daughter and her friends.. im glad i did not pay full price for these
This is a really beautiful set.  Really looks real, but I find I don't wear a lot because it is bulky and uncomfortable between my fingers.
I get a lot of compliments on this ring since it catches the light and glitters. I ordered a size six and it was true to size.
Exactly as depicted in photos. I get compliments every time I wear these rings. They so run a bit small so it might be necessary to go up a size.

If you plan to wear all 3 of these rings together they are tight on the ring finger. Because they stack so high I had to return because they didn't fit right. They look ok but not great on. Wouldn't recommend but if you want a cheap shiny ring they're ok. I don't think they look real.
I wasn't sure from the description but you do get 3 stacking rings!  Very pretty and sparkly!!  Also came in a nice box!
Arrived on time and as promised.  My center band is also a bit larger than the outer two, but I don't mind at all, it looks lovely.

This set is really cute. It looks really and can be a great addition to any ring.
I'm happy with my purchase
Great Buy!!
So pleased with this ring. Simply beautiful and I love wearing them! It's definitely worth the money and I can't stop looking at my hand.
I love this band for its awesome and shiny look. My friends likes it too, I am picky about rings but this one clearly wins my choice.
Beautiful ring.  Wearing as my wedding ring after loosing alot of weight.  Looks fabulos!  Very sparkly and not to bulky.

I just received my order today and the rings are awesome!  They are a good weight not cheap and flimsy like I feared they'd be. They sparkle like crazy and dare I say they look like the real deal? ;)  I am very impressed and I can't wait to wear them.  Thanks Amazon. :)
Do not hesitate to purchase this set.  Very good quality stones as well as the setting.  I am wearing two on either side of a three stone diamond band and it looks great!

This ring is prettier in person. The ring it self is very comfortable to wear. Stones are very real looking. Sparkle beautifully in the sun. I love this. People compliment me on this every day. The ring is also true to size.
Beautiful, small enough to pass for real diamonds, and plenty bling!  Sizing is spot on, and it arrived packaged beautifully.

I just got this and i really like it. The stones are small enough to not give off that cz rainbow thing  The setting is a little shiny and light but in time I hope it darkens a little but it is heavier than some semi-precious stone rings I have in the same style. It is a little big but not enough to make me think it's going to fall off and a size smaller would have made it too small. I am going to separate them and wear one at a time, but people have different tastes and would be able to wear it as they wish and it would still look nice.
Three rings that can be worn together or separately - great deal and looks good too!  Ring is comfortable to wear.

First of all the title is misleading. It states eternity band as in "one" band, this is a set of three bands which makes this an excellent value! On top of that, these bands are beautiful, they sparkle like nobody's business! I bought them to wear along side a princess cut solitaire eternity band, and they look beautiful! They are not too over the top which makes them believable. Love, love, love, them!
these sterling silver stacking eternity bands are very nice, I use them with my diamonds, and you cannot tell the difference until they get dirty, but well worth the money, thank you amazon!

I purchased these for my birthday these are stunning ..great price for beautifully made jewelry ..they sparkle in the sun. I do not regret for one minute for having made this purchase. I love shopping on Amazon. The only thing I regret is having inheriting my fathers big knuckles ...j am a size 7 ring I ordered a size 8 so that the ring can get pass my knuckle then the ring spins all around that is very annoying..I still love these rings. Thank you Kingsway jewelery...Thank you Amazon!
I bought these to wear when not wearing my diamond wedding band.  Had concerns it would look cheap.  To my surprise I started receiving positive comments on it immediately.

I can't wear all three since my ring is squared but I love them. They fit great and I can't tell if it is real or not. I have gotten some compliments on it and I like that I have an extra one in case something happens. They came just in time for me to wear them for Christmas. I may buy some more just to have as spares.
Love these rings!  They are so sparkling - they attract a lot of attention.  Most think they are the "real thing."

This was bought as a gift and the person I bought it for loved it very much so there you go. I brought a smile of a loved one's face for a relatively low price plus the customer service was gr8 this product as well...
Looks like the real thing.  I like that there are 2 different sizes of bands to make it look like a real wedding band set.

I recently purchased this ring because I wanted something to wear to work without wearing my good set. The rings arrived before schedule and are very pretty. I have had many comments on this set. I would reccomend the set!!!

I came down with an extreme allergic reaction to the nickel contained in my 18kt white gold wedding band.  For the meantime this is a great replacement until I get a custom ring that contains no nickel.

I EXCHANGED ANOTHER CZ RING FOR THESE BANDS & THEY ARE STUNNING!!  I COULDN'T BE MORE PLEASED.  THEY SPARKLE LIKE CRAZY & LOOK LIKE THE REAL DEAL!  CAN'T WAIT TO PAIR THEM WITH DIFFERENT RINGS.  SUCH A RING SET MAY BE OVERPOWERING FOR A DAINTY HAND (ALL 3 TOGETHER) BUT THEY ARE SO GORGEOUS & SO VERSATILE!  I'M THRILLED & YOU WILL BE TOO IF YOU DECIDE TO PURCHASE THESE!!!

I was worried about buying this set of rings, when I received them I thought they were beautiful! They are very true to size, so if you purchase them for your dominant hand order a size bigger, I have gotten so many compliments on them, they look real...and I'm not telling anyone there not!
Well worth the money. Shipped quickely, good quality, and very pretty. If this set every wears out, I will purchase another one.
The stacking rings are absolutely beautiful and if they had them in emerald or black diamonds i would have already bought a set of each im going to look around amazon for them

The rings are very beautiful and look real.  I've had several compliments on them.  Only problem was that one of stones fell out after only a couple of times wearing them.  I ordered another set so I would have some replacements.

I LOVE THIS RING HAVE REC'D SIZE 8 TOO SMALL WAS GOING TO RETURN ORDERD SIZE 9 BUT THEN DECIDED TO  STACK THEM ALL TOGETHER AND THEY LOOK GREAT GET LOTS OF COMPLIMENTS . MY WEDDING RINGS I HOPE THEY LAST LOOK WONDERFUL

Shipped quickly, nice product, but only 2 pieces of the 3 "lock" together. The last ring merely just spins around  unlike the other 2. Maybe one of them was shipped wrong?

Edit: My girlfriend still has this ring and still fawns over it constantly. I've bought her a myriad of jewelry over the course of our relationship and she keeps running back to this one. The gems are still shiny, it's fun to play with on your finger, it still looks stunning and is an eye catcher. She gets compliments on it rather frequently. It does bother her that only two of them lock, and the third just spins (even after trying all combinations possible), but all in all she's still very happy with this ring. Happy wife = Happy life. If she's happy, then I'm happy. I personally always wondered if the stone wrapping around the entire band would ever irritate or cut into her other fingers, but she says that it doesn't. All in all, it's a solid purchase.

The band is bright and seems to be well made-I ordered this for granddaughter and she really likes it.  She thinks it will stand up to here daily duties in hospital -wearing it instead of her wedding rings.

I bought this ring(s) hoping to love it, but it was *okay*.  Maybe because I do own real diamonds, my eye is a bit to keen.  I felt like it looked fake.  The silver also seems to bright, which may have been what made it look fake the most.  It wasn't SUPER bad, which is why I gave it 3 stars.  If you're wearing for fun, then you should be happy.  But, if you're wearing it to pass it off as the real thing or to try to impress someone--don't bother!

This ring might be ok for someone with long fingers.its a very large looking ring for someonr with shorter fingers.i could not put my fingers together.the size runs a bit large also.does not look real,but I can see it being  ok as a fun ring.this was not for me I have the wrong type of fingers for it.
Was looking for something for the wife for our 10 year anniversary and found this, wasn't sure what she would think of it but when she opened it her eyes lit up and she Loved it!
Looks very real, very pleased! Actually going to be wearing this with a matching zirconia bracelet at my daughter's wedding.

I bought this ring because i always wanted to add an anniversary ring to my wedding ring... these rings look so fake next to my wedding ring... if u are buying it to wear next to high quality jewelry ...do not buy.. but if you plan on wearing it by it's self... BUY IT...

Not happy :( I was so excited for these, and I'm sure the rings would be wonderful if they weren't tarnished!! Not sure if they were just old stock or what, but they def didn't look new. I will prob just try to clean them up the best I can.

I purchased this set because I wanted to see if a stackable set of right would nice with my engagement ring as I am getting married in March.  I have since been wearing the rings and have gotten so many compliments on them! Worth the price and shine just as a real diamond does!
I am very happy with my purchase! The rings are beautiful and look very expensive!  I find myself looking at them and smiling!

I bought this item as a test to determine if I wanted an eternity band as I heard they were uncomfortable and I did not want to spend alot of money for something I did not like. I LOVE this ring and I plan on wearing it for a long time. It's actually three rings so if you feel like wearing just one band you can and it is very pretty. It looks expensive and I have had numerous comments from people regarding how pretty it is and when I tell them how much it cost they are shocked. Well worth the money and I received it very quickly:)
Just what I wanted...great buy. It came in 3 days and wears very nicely. A nice gift from me to me. The ring does not disapoint.
GREAT - FAR BETTER THAN I WOULD HAVE THOUGHT.  THEY ARE NOT TURNING AND I HAVE WORN SEVERAL TIMES WITHOUT ANY PROBLEMS
I love this ring. It is really quite pretty. I get compliments on it all the time and people don't realize that is cz.

I wasn't really sure what to expect of this set of 3 rings.  However, it's a very appealing ring. I'm not sure if I could fool anyone that they're real diamonds but it's still very beautiful and I plan to wear it often.

resonable price. No bad for private wearing.
If you need to look better. Should make by used more weight of sterling silver.and bigger Cz.if the price is more expensive but i can affordable.
for conclusion this ring good enough for private wearing and reasonable price

Love these rings. Came quickly & flawless. One does have stones just a little bigger than the other two. I put the two that matched on either side of my engagement ring and they all look gorgeous together. I have small hands and still all three rings on are comfortable. I can also wear all three of these bands together on my wedding ring finger to switch it up if I want a change. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants something that looks real and expensive without spending the "real" money. Someone actually thought they were real today so they passed the test. I have done everything I normally would with them on...shower, lotion, work, dishes. So far no issues.

The ring is beautiful. very nice, very shiny. size is dead on. one of my favorite rings yet. U can wash your hands with it and not worry about tarnishing it. It defiantly stays shiny and new " ) I am very happy with it. it was defin a great buy

very nice stacking set.
See loved it and I got the size right only on the second time!!!...my fault not theirs!

These are really nice rings. I usually do not like eternity bands but these are really nice. Yes one band is slightly larger then the other two but it still looks fabulous. I wear them on my index finger or thumb because I ordered one size larger thinking I needed to but they are really nice rings. Dont hessitate. Buy them. Great item.

I've had my rings for about a month now and I wear them daily including to my work at a restaurant so I am constantly washIng my hands and they have held up wonderfully! They seemed like they would be uncomfortable at first but after a few days I didn't notice them any longer. They are very pretty and don't look fake at all! Highly recommend.
Its so beautiful, it came in a lttle bag and sparks like diamond. iam considering another one because it looks so rich thoigh i haven't used it for long.just 5 days old.

These are so beautiful. I got these for summer, hands swell and I cant wear my normal rings, and for traveling...so I don't have to worry so much. These have gotten me so many compliments and they are still shiny.

I received these 3 rings quite quickly. They are very believable. I would highly recommend these rings to everyone, you can wear all three together, or you can dress up another ring, by putting one of these rings on either side of your ring, and give it a whole different look!!!!

I read all the reviews so i ordered my own. Soooooo impressed! it is beautiful and it fits great, some people said that one of the bands stones are smaller than the other two, i cant tell. I am so impressed with these rings. Buy.
Love this ring set! Have not had any issues with tarnishing, the fit was perfect! Excellent product for the price!
Ring is gorgeous.  It looks so real it is unbelievable.  i hesitated to purchase thinking for the price cant be good. But it is incredible. So glad I bought it.

I love how the ring sparkles, like diamonds. I have gotten some many compliments on this ring when I wear one at a time, double, or all three together. It looks just as real as my actual diamonds. I would definitely recommend this ring.

My fiancee and I bought this ring set as a wedding band - we spent a lot on the engagement ring, so we decided to go cheap on the wedding band. This fit the bill perfectly - although it is not real diamond, it compliments the real ring well. We liked that we got three rings for this price, so that we could choose between the slightly-larger or one of the smaller bands (we chose the smaller), and we now have a replacement band in case it gets lost. The only complaint I've heard from her is that after washing her hands, she gets bubbles and popping noises from the ring due to the holes on the inside of the band. For the price, I couldn't think of anything better though!

I love this ring. I bought not fully sure what I would get by other reviews. The sizing was dead on. The stones sparkle great and catch the light just perfectly. One ring is slightly larger than the others but I put the larger one in the middle and actually like that look better than I would if they were all the same. I would recommend this ring to anyone!

I was really excited to receive these rings.  I really wanted to love them but I have to agree with the poster who said there is just something about them that makes them look fake and "Made in China" as stamped on the inside.  I can't pinpoint it exactly either.  This is definitely a case of you get what you pay for.  By looking at the metal, there is no way these would hold up to daily wear as wedding/anniversary bands.  It almost looks like tin foil and I can tell if would start flaking.  I am sure though the designer didn't necessarily intend these to be worn as every day rings.

Would be fun wear to a party or on the right hand but I put 2 of these on either side of my wedding band and engagement ring and it was laughable how fake they looked next to the real deal.  My setting is in platinum so that might not help but even if someone has white gold, these are not going to match.

As far as costume jewelry or something sparkly to wear on the right hand, these are cute little rings.  In that regard they should get a 5 star.

It sparkles and looks nice. I absolutely LOVE thicker bands so when I saw this, I had to try it. I loved having the option to wear all 3 or just 1. I wore it for a week then decided this had to go back. As much as I liked this, it was just too uncomfortable. The prongs stick out a lot and goes all the way around which pokes the sides of your fingers. I tried to deal with the discomfort but by the 5th or 6th day, I was soo ready to return it. Maybe this will work for someone who had really thin fingers but it was just too uncomfortable for me.
I was hesitant about this purchase. But it is definetly worth the price. They sparkle and look like real diamonds. I will order another set just in case. Love them :)

I recieved these rings a couple of days ago and really love them. They have alot of sparkle and feel comfortable on my finger. I wear them with a dimond solitare and it looks really sharp. I plan on wearing them everyday so I hope they hold up and stones stay in place. I would definatley recommend this ring and I have no regrets with my purchase

I ordered these in size 7 and maybe it's becaus of my chubby ring finger, it looks bad when I put 3 on or wear one with my engagement ring... it sparkles when I wear just one, but I want to stack them with my real diamond ring... I guess this gives me an excuse to order another set in size 8 :)

Overall very happy with my purchase... Thank you.

The rings are perfect, I can just wear one of them and it shines better than my real wedding band, I've attached a picture of the 3 in my finger. Very good quality can't beat the price, I found it to be true to size, I ordered 5 and it fit perfect. I am very happy with my purchase.
i love these rings! they look very real and are so pretty. they are a little big but i am going to buy another set in a smaller size!! so happy with this product!

I was really skeptical about these rings after reading the reviews, but my wife loves them.  The middle band is a bit bigger than the outer two, which doesn't show in the picture, but it still looks nice.  They don't look fake, which was my main concern.  If you looked really closely you could probably tell they are CZ, but they look great to me.
the product is amazing quality! they clanged ;ole ex[ensive jewelry when i was opening the box. very realistic. not too much bling. so simple and elegant. i love it! plus shipping was super fast!

I love the look of this ring. I've worn the rings for two weeks straight now.  They don't grap on my clothes and I've even worn them in the shower with them coming out looking perfect.

The sizing was correct.

I was looking for a costume set to go on either side of my engagement ring.  After reading the reviews on these rings, I thought they might work.  I was wrong.  They are clearly costume when worn next to quality jewelry.  They are also not all the same size.  One of the bands was a bit wider than the others.  All in all, I wasn't impressed enough to keep them to wear casually on their own.  These were repackaged, and returned.  Good luck ladies!

I just received my rings last night and they are very pretty. Good quality and lots of sparkle. Since they are eternity bands they are a little bulkier than some stacking rings, especially since they are prong set. I have average size hands and I am happy with the fit and comfort. They are true to size. Shipping was prompt and the item was well packaged.
very good product no flaws  looks to good and very nice quality  would buy more rings and things from this  deler again  thanks again

IT's really nice. I told everybody who I know this rings.
They said it's so pretty and nice price.
I love this...

I just got these rings for valentines day and I am so impressed. They sparkle beautifully and I don't find them uncomfortable at all. The top and bottom together make great ring guards and the three together are extremely beautiful as well. I am so happy with this set.

This ring is beautiful and it can be separated as one individual ring.  My finger is small , so it'd good that I could wear only 2 rings.  The Zirconias size are not so big, so it can convince people better that way.  If you look for something simple and comfy, this is the ring that you are looking for.

The rings are great.  I wear two of them with my three stone ring in the middle and it is so sparkling and then I wear a blue stack eternity ring in the middle which looks very rich and yet simplistic at the same time.  Even with all three rings on the finger is still very comfortable.  I have had people comment on the ring about how it sparkles and where did I get it? I got it right after Christmas and the price was very good and the quality is wonderful.  Buy it you'll like it.
I received the ring...it looked soo much better in the picture. I looks extremely cheap, like a ring that you would buy from a vending machine.

This is a very pretty eternity band. The stones seem to be well set.  As others have mentioned, one of the bands has bigger sized stones. I guess it's not so bad since it adds a little flair, but the picture provided by Amazon is not accurate. Others have also mentioned how uncomfortable the ring is and that it pokes on the sides of their fingers. I have skinny/bony fingers, and I do not experience any uncomfortableness with these rings. There is a bit of a gap between each ring, but that's because one band has larger stones. Overall, I like them. They are shiny!
Shipping was very fast and came in a velvet pouch but don't  waste your money. It looks cheap on and feels cheap. Very dissapoibted in this purchase.

This is a lovely ring set. Beautifully made, quite heavy (doesn't feel light and cheap) and sparkles nicely.  My only observations (not complaints really) would be that the stones in the two stacking rings on either side are much smaller than the middle ring, something that is not noticeable in the picture. The second thing is that there is a big "CHINA" stamp inside the ring. If you're fussy about such things then don't get this ring.

All in all a lovely ring set and well worth the money for something that you can wear every day that will give your hand added sparkle.
It's a beautiful ring real silver I've bought my partner other real diamonds and nothing looks as good this one it's pretty and she loves it

I was excited to receive my eternity band set and shocked at how realistic they are. I've had so many compliments. They look so real,no one has guessed their not real diamonds. I'm very happy with my purchase and plan on ordering more cz's from Amazon.

I just received this great trio set.  I was looking for something to replace my original wedding band that had lost diamonds.  We really had no desire to buy a "real" one again at this point.  I looked on Amazon for weeks and found this beauty!!

I used the outer two to flank my engagement ring.  They are the perfect size.  Not too small thus making it hard to see, nor to big making it look fake and gaudy.

I don't find them uncomfortable either.  Very realistic looking!

I've also added pictures of my flanked rings to their photo gallery!

I really love this.  I did not find it too thick- and it is very comfortable.  I have large fingers, so it does not push my fingers apart- but I think if you were petite it might be uncomfortable, especially if you had thin fingers.  It does look like diamonds.  I've had a lot of compliments, and I wore it with a real diamond bracelet, and no one could tell the difference between the ring and the bracelet.  We were out at a restaurant, and the lighting wasn't super bright, but even in daylight I think it looks like diamonds.  I'd much rather wear this out, than my real diamond ring.
They are well made and look great with one in each side of my solitaire! I have had many compliments already. Also fast shipping!
I am very happy I ordered this ring. It is gorgeous! Do not hesitate to purchase it!  I hope it doesn't fade:)!

I bought this ring because my real one was stolen a few years ago. I have been asked about getting my ring back and people are surprised to find out it is not it. I love it, nice quality, great price.
Great sparkle, accurate sizing.  Perfect amount of bling! I would love to have a set for my pinkie as well.

I was looking for a replacement wedding band, not too expensive because I recently lost my real wedding band (so sad)! This ring is far from "real" looking. Its very sparkly but its just something about it, that looks unreal...hard to explain. I hate to return things, but I am returning this ring. This ring is good to compliment other costume type jewelry, but will never pass for "real".

This ring is fantastic. I have short fingers and read some of the other reviews about it possibly being wide but really, this ring is fantastic. It looks terrific and I can't go anywhere without getting compliments. I'd suggest this to everyone I know if they wanted a really beautiful right hand ring.
This is such a beautiful ring!!!!  I can't wait to wear it.  It's the perfect touch for an evening out.

These rings are perfect! I bought these because I lost a stone from my wedding band and I wanted to replace it, so now I have one to replace it and one to wear as an anniversary band and another as a back up! Ther fit true to size and are wonderful. Good buy :)

The rings are pretty but as a few other people mentioned, not the most comfortable. I like the fact that you can wear one or all three, the only problem while wearing all three is there's gaps between the rings (they don't stack tightly) and seem to come apart. For this reason I prefer to wear one on my thumb, looks cool and keeps the ring from rubbing on the other fingers. I cannot imagine wearing these on a middle finger, ouch. They are well made (hence the 4 stars) and hopefully the little CZ's won't fall out as they have done in other rings I've purchased elsewhere and had to return.
These rings are amazing!!They look amazing and they really sparkle..I am so glad that I bought these and they will be rings that I will continue to wear!!

After an extensive search, I found these to be the best price. When I received them, I was very pleased. They are true to size, and, despite having stones all the way around, they are comfortable. The center band is very slightly wider than the other two, which gives the set interest. However, I was basically looking for two little bands to stack before and after a white gold and mixed gemstone ring I received as a birthday present and these are *perfect*.

While I agree with everyone else that it's a beautiful ring set and that you can't tell their not real, I noticed that after a month or 2 they went from fitting perfectly to becoming a little big/loose on my finger...Maybe it's just me and my set of rings or someting...I can still wear them, it's just not as perfect a fit as before...Certinly not something to send in and get a different size...
I bought these to serve as wedding bands and they are beautiful. The stackable effect is so pretty and the way the cz's shine makes them look expensive!
